SENTENSE.VALUE: Student Registration

The automated registration process is currently unavailable. Proceed to the Brawler Instructor to get an application form. Your Instructor will then give you further instructions. You will be rewarded with Skill Points upon completing the registration process. Click the [Details] button for more information.
Acquiring a Registration Form

Proceed to the Instructor in the Brawler Section and get the application for registration. The form must be acquired from the instructor himself since student registration isn't automated. If you fail to find him, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 11 Y: 7(Main Centre).
Confirm the Health Room's Location

The Health Room provides free medical treatment. Students will need to visit this place often in the future, which is why they are required to learn where it is during the registration period. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 4 Y: 22(Main Centre).
Delivering the Registration Form

Please submit the registration form to the Student Director at the Admin Office after filling it up. The Admin Office is located at the entrance of Main Center 1st floor, next to the Grocery Merchant. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 8 Y: 0(Main Centre).
Collecting the Bread

You can recover HP by eating Bread. Registered students, please collect some Bread from the vendor at the Welfare Society. The Grocery Merchant is located next to the entrance on the 1st floor of Main Campus. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 10 Y: 3(Main Centre).
Final Confirmation

Return to the Brawler Section and hand over the Completed Registration Form to the Instructor. After getting final registration approval, you will acquire the Exit Application Form. All students must complete the Exit Application to ensure the campus's safety. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 11 Y: 7(Main Centre).
Exit Approval

Submit the Exit Application Form to the Student Director at the Admin Office. Collect all the needed basic equipment, and wisely allocate the rewarded Skill Points. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 8 Y: 0(Main Centre).

Student Registration

The automated registration process is currently unavailable. Proceed to the Sword Instructor to get an application form. Your Instructor will then give you further instructions. You will be rewarded with Skill Points upon completing the registration process. Click the [Details] button for more information.
Acquiring a Registration Form

Proceed to the Instructor in the Sword Section and get the application for registration. The form must be acquired from the instructor himself since student registration isn't automated. If you fail to find him, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 18 Y: 15(Main Centre).
Confirm the Health Room's Location

The Health Room provides free medical treatment. During the registration period, students must be familiar with the locations that will often be visited in future. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 4 Y: 22(Main Centre).
Confirm the location of Basic Science Classroom

Use the Terminal in the Basic Science Classroom to retrieve the information needed. The Basic Science Classroom is located at the 1st floor after the Locker Room. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 22 Y: 3(Main Centre).
Delivering the Registration Form

Please submit the registration form to the Student Director at the Admin Office then fill up the form. The Admin Office is located at the entrance of Main Center 1st floor, next to the Grocery Merchant. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 8 Y: 0(Main Centre).
Collecting the Bread

You can recover HP by eating Bread. Registered students, please collect some Bread from the vendor at the Welfare Society. The Grocery Merchant is located next to the entrance on the 1st floor of Main Campus. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 10 Y: 3(Main Centre).
Final Approval

Return to the Sword Section and hand over the Completed Registration Form to the Instructor. After getting final registration approval, you will acquire the Exit Application Form. This rule is to ensure every student's safety within the campus. It is a must that the students complete the Exit Application. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 18 Y: 15(Main Centre).
Exit Approval

Submit the Exit Application Form to the Student Director at the Admin Office. Collect all the needed basic equipment, and wisely allocate the rewarded Skill Points. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 8 Y: 0(Main Centre).

Student Director's Test

It isn't safe to be outside anymore: many students are getting injured by the evil monsters because of that have appeared because of the weird events happening recently. *Sigh* The Student Director is conducting a little ability test for newly registered students to make sure they can handle the dangers if they have to venture outside. This test involves collecting Cigarette Butts from the Little Hooligans.
Collecting Cigarette Butts

Those weird Little Hooligans are loitering outside the Main Campus! They're the ones wearing jeans and holding chains in their hands. Collect 2 Cigarette Butts from the Little Hooligans to test your skills.
Get Validation from the Student Director

Please get 2 Cigarette Butts from the Little Hooligans, and give them to the Student Director. Passing this test will earn you permission to leave campus and some Skill Points. <Tip> Main Centre -> Student Director

Nurse's Request
Oh dear, I ran out of medical record forms. Would you please help me by buying a new one from the Grocery Merchant?
Buy a Medical Record

Give the Medical Record
Deliver the Medical Record to the Nurse. <Tip> Main Centre -> Nurse

The Force Field Authentication

We have Force Field Systems that protect us, but the system outside campus recently went haywire, causing people and other creatures outside to mutate. It's lucky that the Force Field protecting the campus is still stable. Now, I need you to check the Force Field Systems in other areas, and make sure that they're working properly. Authenticating these other Force Field Systems will increase their effectiveness.
Test the Terminal in Study Classroom Center 2
Confirm the location of Study Classroom Center 2, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 2 Spiritual Spheres from the Little Hooligans around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in Study Classroom Center 2.
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Test the Terminal in Right Dragon Park
Confirm the location of Right Dragon Park, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 4 Spiritual Spheres from the Little Bandits around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in Right Dragon Park
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Test the Terminal in the History Center
Confirm the location of the History Center, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 8 Spiritual Spheres from the Bandits around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in the History Center
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.

Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.

Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Final Force Field Authentication
Please finalize the Force Field Authentications by giving them to the Student Director at the Admin Office.

Heading outside the Campus

The world has been exposed to the spreading infection, creating all these monsters that are beginning to gather outside the campus. Many students that weren't aware of this threat were seriously injured once they stepped outside of campus grounds. The school will now only allow students that have proven to be strong enough to go outside. For this purpose, the Main Gate's Terminal is equipped with a Skill Testing System or [STS]. Skill Testing System

The Main Gate's Terminal has been modified and equipped with a Skill Testing System or [STS]. If you truly believe that you are strong enough to deal with the fiends outside, you must first prove it by completing this test. Your ID will be registered on all 3 school Terminals once you pass this test, allowing you to freely move in and out of campus.
The Skill Test

Your mission is to take out 10 Onslaughts in 40 minutes. These creatures have strong attack power but slow movement speed. They are vulnerable to High-Speed Attacks since they halt their movement. It is advised to use Speed Skills to easily take out these creatures and complete the test.
Heading outside the Campus

Introduction to New Students
All new students can obtain basic supplies from the Grocery Merchant. Click the [Details] button for more information.
Look for the Grocery Merchant

Go to your own Main Centre! The Grocery Merchant is in charge of guiding new students. Look for the Grocery Merchant to get basic help information. If you fail to find her, please refer to the map coordinates X: 10 Y: 2(Main Centre).
Attain Level 5
The Grocery Merchant is in charge of guiding new students. Please Attain Level 5, and get the approval from the Grocery Merchant. Click the [Details] button for further instructions.
Proceed to the Grocery Merchant

It is said that if you reach Level 5, the Grocery Merchant will give you fair compensation. After you reach Level 5, proceed to the Grocery Merchant. If you fail to find her, please refer to the map coordinates X: 10 Y: 2(Main Centre).

Improvised Medicines
The Nurse is running out of medicine, and asked you to collect Cigarette Butts so that she improvise and make some more. Click the [Details] button for more information.
Collecting Cigarette Butts
Collect 20 Cigarette Butts from Hooligans.
Turning in the Cigarette Butts

Please give 20 Cigarette Butts to the Nurse in the Health Room as soon as you collect them. She will use them to make medicine. If you cannot find her, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 4 Y: 22.

Stolen Bandages
We are running out of medical supplies. The Street Junkies stole our bandages and are using them for themselves. Please retrieve some bandages from the Street Junkies.
Retrieving the Stolen Bandages
Retrieve 20 Bandages from the Street Junkies.
Return the Stolen Bandages

Please return the bandages you've retrieved from the Street Junkies by handing them over to the Nurse in the Health Room. They are urgently needed by the injured students. If you fail to find them, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 4 Y: 22.

Obtain the Special Broom
You'll need a Special Broom to clean the Dormitory. Rent the Broom from the Locker Custodian.
Find the Locker Custodian
The Locker Custodian keeps a Special Broom that you can use. You'll need some money in order to rent it.
Cleaning the Dormitory
Piles of Trash in the Dormitory were contaminated when the widespread mutations occurred. You can use a Special Broom designed to detoxify this Trash to control the contamination problem.
Cleaning the Dormitory Trash
You might be able to recover some useful stuff by cleaning Trash with the Special Broom. If you fail to find the Dormitory, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 43 Y: 59.
Delivering the Trash
Give the detoxified Trash to the Student Director.

We have Force Field Systems that protect us, but the system outside campus recently went haywire, causing people and other creatures outside to mutate. It's lucky that the Force Field protecting the campus is still stable. Now, I need you to check the Force Field Systems in other areas, and make sure that they're working properly. Authenticating these other Force Field Systems will increase their effectiveness.

You must collect 3 Spiritual Spheres from the Little Hooligans around Study Classroom Center 2.
Optimize the Force Field System in Study Classroom Center 2

Guard's Request

The guard is looking for the medication requested by the Nurse. The Short Notes containing the prescription were taken by the Blood Drinker. Although it'll be a difficult job, please retrieve the Short Notes.
Recycling the Short Notes

The Short Notes have been taken by the Blood Drinker. They must be retrieved as soon as possible because the Short Notes contain the prescription for medication that is urgently needed. The Blood Drinker is stronger than the other enemies on Campus, so please be very careful.
Delivering the Short Notes
Please send the Short Notes to the guard if you succeed in collecting them.
Guard's Request 2
Although the Short Notes have been found, the guard hasn't been able to find all the medication on the not. Please help him collect the medicine since it's needed very urgently.
Collecting the Medication

Although the Short Notes have been found, the guard hasn't been able to find all the medication on the not. Please help him collect the medicine since it's needed very urgently. I've heard that the Blood Drinker has the medication: you must collect 10 Small HP Recovery Potions, 10 Medium MP Recovery Potions, and 10 Medium SP Recovery Potions.
Confirmation of the Medication
Please send the medication to the security guard for confirmation once you succeed in getting it all.
Delivering the Medication

The guard has some problems directly sending the medication to the Nurse, so please ask the students to send the medication on his behalf. Send the medication to the Nurse in the Health Room of the Main Center.
Guard's Request 3

Although the guard on duty at the main entrance was sent by the Nurse, he seems to be disturbed by the Blood Drinker and the Swordie Ardee. He isn't satisfied with their Short Swords, so please collect the Daggers as he requested.
Dagger Confiscation
Please get the Brandishment Daggers from Swordie Ardee.
Dagger Delivery
Please give 10 Brandishment Daggers to the security guard for confirmation once you get them.
Bus Driver's Request

You need to collect bus accessory parts from the Technical Teacher near the campus's road junction to repair the broken bus. The public bus would serve as convenient transportation in the city and campuses once it's been repaired. It seems that the buses in other areas have also broken down and are not operational.
Finding Technical Teacher (Sacred Gate)
Go to the T-junction of campus to find the Technical Teacher who is waiting for you. Please ask for the bus accessories.
Deliver Component
Bring the components from the Technical Teacher, and give them to the Bus Driver at Sacred Gate carpark to repair the bus.
Bus Driver's Request 2

The Bus Driver met the Construction Supervisor earlier at a nearby construction site, and promised to help him with something. The Bus Driver, however, can't leave his position because he needs to repair the bus. Please meet the Construction Supervisor on behalf of the Bus Driver, and listen to his request.
Visit the Construction Supervisor (SG)

The junctions are part of the Main Center of the construction site, and there is one on each of the two sides of the construction site. The construction site is separated by the 3rd Hole and 4th Hole, and the Technical Teacher is closer to the 4th Hole. Please go to the 3rd Hole to find the Construction Supervisor.
Construction Supervisor's Request

The Construction workers at Sacred Gate Hole have been mutated into monsters. The Construction Supervisor might still be able to complete the construction work before his deadline, but the power generator has broken down. He needs to get some components for the power generator from Sacred Gate's Technical Teacher.
Finding the Technical Teacher (SG)
Meet the Technical Teacher (SG) at the T-Junction.
Searching for the Generator Parts
Please get the Generator Parts from Fatty Bom-Bom.
Delivering the Generator Parts
Please deliver the Generator Parts to the Construction Supervisor (SG).
The Physics Teacher's Call
Something must have happened at Sacred Gate Ring since a scream was heard from there. Please find Sacred Gate's Physics Teacher as soon as you can in Sacred Gate Ring to find the lost students.
Finding the Physics Teacher (SG)
Look for the Physics Teacher at Sacred Gate Ring. Something must have happened if the Physics Teacher screamed like that.
The Physics Teacher's Test
The campus is always testing the students to prepare them to fight ever stronger enemies. Please accept the permanent test from the Physics Teacher for more instructions.
The Permanent Skill Test
Please eliminate 15 Cordies within 40 minutes in order to pass the test.
Confirmation of the Test Results
Please ask the Physics Teacher (SG) for confirmation once you finish the test.
Unverified Currency Notes

Some suspicious money was recently found in the city center. Please investigate who has been making this counterfeit money along with the money's purpose. If this fake currency problem isn't handled, then it could end up being pretty dangerous. The Student Director at the Admin Office might be able to give you some clues.
Visit the Technical Teacher (SG)

I've heard that the Technical Teacher was keeping the counterfeit money to examine it. Get the extra unverified currency notes from the Technical Teacher at Campus junction and send them to the Student Director.
Delivering the Unverified Currency Notes
Bring the currency notes to the Student Director (SG) and wait for his instructions.
Proceed to Mystic Peak Campus

The Student Director already knew about the situation, so please go and inform the others campuses. Please find the Student Director who's keeping the currency notes in Mystic Peak Campus Admin Office.
Restoring the Computer Room

The Student Director of Mystic Peak Campus says that some of the facilities need to be restored for authentication. From what I heard, the Phoenix Campus Admin Office has the back-up disk for restoring purposes, so please help him get it.
Sending the Back-up Disk
Please deliver the disk to Mystic Peak Campus Admin Office and help them to restore the Computer Room facility. This has to be done in order to identify the Currency Notes.
Delivering the Prospectus
Please bring the Prospectus back to Sacred Gate Campus and give it to the Student Director.
Issue the Order Books

The Student Director received the proposal and certainly thought that they weren't normal currency. He suspected that the notes were used for some purpose, and has ordered that anyone that has received this money must be brought in and reported to him. Retrieve the Order Books from the Financial Group and give them to the Security Guard at the main entrance, and then deliver the Order Books to the Technical Teacher and Physics Teacher.
Retrieving the Order Books
Get the mail sent by the Sacred Financial Group, and give them to the Security Guard who is waiting at the main entrance.
Deliver the Order Books to the Technical Teacher (SG)
Please deliver the Order Books to the Technical Teacher (SG) at the campus junction.
Deliver the Order Books to the Physics Teacher (SG)
Please deliver the Order Books to the Physics Teacher (SG) at Sacred Gate Ring.
Recycling the Map

According to the report, some strange people tore up the location map for Leonair Campus. The pieces of the map may have been taken by the clowns who were seen at that incident, so please find them and recover the map to find the Campus's location. The cause of these strange happenings might be found at Leonair Campus.
Searching for the Map Pieces

According to the Physics Teacher's report, you must go to Sacred Gate Campus and find the Clowns with the map pieces. Try to find all 7 pieces of Leonair Campus Map.(kill the clowns to get the map pieces)
Verification of the Map Pieces
Please give all 7 pieces of the map to the Physics Teacher (SG) at Sacred Gate Ring to receive confirmation.
Putting the Map Back Together

Bring the pieces of the map to Sacred Gate Campus, and ask the Student Director to recover the map. Although the pieces are in bad condition, the Student Director can restore the map since he used to work as an archeologist.
Proceed to Leonair Campus
Go to Sacred Gate Hole. Head to the map coordinates, 135, 115, and confirm the location of Leonair Campus. Send it to the Financial Sacred Group, and then talk to the Special Agent.
Recycling the Unverified Currency Notes

The test on the notes revealed that the money definitely isn't normal. Please search the city for the scattered notes since they might be part of some disastrous plot that might be triggered in the future.
Recycling the Currency Notes
I've heard that the Construction Fatties around the site are collecting these currency notes. Please try to get the notes from them.
Delivering the Currency Notes
Please give 20 of the counterfeit notes to the Student Director at the Admin Office once you succeed in collecting them.
Nurse's Request

Although the hospital has run out of supplies, the nurse cannot leave her position because of the constant influx of patients. Please help by bringing some medication to the nurse at Sacred Gate Ring.
Getting the Medication
Please get some medication from the Nurse (Ring) near the medical bus at Sacred Gate Ring.
Delivering the Medication
Please send the medication to the Nurse near Sacred Gate Parking Bay. This drug package will be used to treat the injured, so please be careful when delivering the medication.
Nurse's Request 2

Phoenix Campus was informed that the Physics Teacher at Phoenix Square needs some emergency medication to treat the students. Please help them bring some extra medications from the Physics Teacher of Mystic Peak Campus. Click the [Details] button for more information.
Collecting the Medication
Please get the extra medications from the Physics Teacher near Mystic Peak Square.
Delivering the Medication
Please send the medications to the Physics Teacher of Phoenix Campus near the Phoenix T-junction.
Delivering the Proposal

After sending the medications to the Physics Teacher of Phoenix Campus, you must send the collected proposal to the Nurse at Sacred Gate Ring. The information for the needed medication and medical products must be sent as soon as possible.
Cleaner's Request

Cleaning the roads isn't easy. There are many empty bottles scattered everywhere that weren't there before. The empty bottles can be recycled, and cleaning up garbage will help alleviate the world's problems. Please collect them all and give them to the Cleaner.
Recycling the Empty Bottles
I heard that the Miner Fatty at the construction site have empty bottles on them. Go and collect the empty bottles from them.
Delivering the Empty Bottles
If you succeed in collecting 20 empty bottles, please give them to the Cleaner at Sacred Gate Ring.

The campus is always testing the students to prepare them to fight ever stronger enemies. Please accept the permanent test from the Technical Teacher for more instructions.

To complete the test, you must eliminate 20 Uncle Potato within 20 minutes.

If you accomplished the test, please go and ask the Technical Teacher (SG) for confirmation.

If this fake currency problem isn't handled, then it could end up being pretty dangerous. The Student Director at the Admin Office might be able to give you some clues.
Visit the Technical Teacher (Phoenix)

I've heard that the Physics Teacher was keeping the counterfeit money to examine it. Get the extra unverified currency notes from the Physics Teacher at the 4th Industrial Zone and send them to the Student Director.
Delivering the Unverified Currency Notes
Bring the currency notes to the Student Director (Phoenix) and wait for his instructions.
Proceed to Sacred Gate Campus
The Student Director already knew about the situation, so please go and inform the others campuses. Please find the Student Director who's keeping the currency notes in Sacred Gate Admin Office.
Restoring the Computer Room

The Student Director of Sacred Gate Campus says that some of the facilities needs to be restored for authentication. From what I heard, Mystic Peak Campus Admin Office has the back-up disk for restoring purposes, so please help him get it.
Sending the Back-up Disk
Please deliver the disk to the Admin Office of Sacred Gate Campus and help them to restore the Computer Room facility. This has to be done in order to identify the Currency Notes.
Delivering the Prospectus
Please bring the Prospectus back to Phoenix Campus and give it to the Student Director.
Issue the Order Books

The Student Director received the proposal and certainly thought that they weren't normal currency. He suspected that the notes were used for some purpose, and has ordered that anyone that has received this money must be brought in and reported to him. Retrieve the Order Books from the Financial Group and give them to the Security Guard at the main entrance, and then deliver the Order Books to the Technical Teacher and Physics Teacher.
Retrieving the Order Books
Get the mail sent by the Sacred Financial Group, and give them to the Security Guard who is waiting at the main entrance.
Deliver the Order Books to the Technical Teacher (Phoenix)
Please deliver the Order Books to the Technical Teacher (Phoenix) near the 4th Industrial Zone.
Deliver the Order Memo to the Physics Teacher (Phoenix)
Please deliver the Order Memo to the Physics Teacher (Phoenix) at Phoenix Square.
Recycling the Map

According to the report, some strange people tore up the location map for Leonair Campus. The pieces of the map may have been taken by the clowns who were seen at that incident, so please find them and recover the map to find the Campus's location. The cause of these strange happenings might be found at Leonair Campus.
Searching for the Map Pieces

According to the Physics Teacher's report, you must go to Sacred Gate Campus and find the Clowns with the map pieces. Try to find all 7 pieces of Leonair Campus Map.(kill the clowns to get the map pieces)
Verification of the Map Pieces
If you find all 7 pieces, please give them to the Physics Teacher (Phoenix) at Sacred Gate Ring to get confirmation.
Putting the Map Back Together

Bring the pieces of the map to Sacred Gate Campus, and ask the Student Director to recover the map. Although the pieces are in bad condition, the Student Director can restore the map since he used to work as an archeologist.
Proceed to Leonair Campus
Go to Sacred Gate Hole. Head to the map coordinates, 135, 115, and confirm the location of Leonair Campus. Send it to the Financial Sacred Group, and then talk to the Special Agent.

Recycling the Unverified Currency Notes

The test on the notes revealed that the money definitely isn't normal. Please search the city for the scattered notes since they might be part of some disastrous plot that might be triggered in the future.
Recycling the Currency Notes
I've heard that the Car Engineers around the construction site are collecting these currency notes. Please try to get the notes from them.
Delivering the Currency Notes
Please give 20 of the counterfeit notes to the Student Director at the Admin Office once you succeed in collecting them.
Nurse's Request

Although the hospital has run out of supplies, the nurse cannot leave her position because of the constant influx of patients. Please help by bringing some medication to the nurse at Sacred Gate Ring.
Getting the Medication
Please get some medication from the Nurse (Ring) near the medical bus at Sacred Gate Ring.
Delivering the Medication
Please send the medication to the Nurse near the Phoenix Parking Bay. This drug package will be used to treat the injured, so please be careful when delivering the medication.

Cleaner's Request

Cleaning the roads isn't easy. There are many empty bottles scattered everywhere that weren't there before. The empty bottles can be recycled, and cleaning up garbage will help alleviate the world's problems. Please collect them all and give them to the Cleaner.
Recycling the Empty Bottles
I heard that the Sanitizers at the construction site have empty bottles on them. Go and collect the empty bottles from them.
Delivering the Empty Bottles
Please give 20 empty bottles to the Cleaner at the 4th Industrial Zone. Recycle these bottles to make them useful again.
¸Á°¢ÀÇ ¾à Àç·á ÀÔ¼ö

Technical Teacher's Test
The campus is always testing the students to prepare them to fight ever stronger enemies. Please accept the permanent test from the Technical Teacher for more instructions.
The Permanent Skill Test
You must eliminate 20 Blood Hungers within 40 minutes to complete the test.
Confirmation of the Test Results
Please ask the Technical Teacher (Phoenix) for confirmation once you complete the test.
Eliminate the Car Engineers
Herds of monsters are lurking around and wreaking havoc in the area. Please help eliminate those monsters.
Eliminating the Car Engineers
A lot of people were attacked by the Car Engineers in the Junk Car Yard. Although you may not be able to destroy them all, you can whittle down their numbers by eliminating 30 of them.
Confirmation of the Test Results
Please ask the Physics Teacher (Phoenix) for confirmation once you complete the test.
Eliminate the Freezing Halogens
Herds of monsters are lurking around and wreaking havoc in the area. Please help eliminate those monsters.
Eliminating the Freezing Halogens
A lot of people were attacked by the Freezing Halogens around the Park. Although you may not be able to eliminate all of them, you can whittle down their numbers by eliminating 25 of them.
Confirmation of the Test Results
Please ask the Physics Teacher (SG) for confirmation once you finish the test.
Eliminate the Bomber Clowns
Hordes of monsters are wreaking havoc in the area. Please help eliminate the threat of these monsters.
Eliminating the Bomber Clowns
A lot of people were attacked by the Bomber Clown around the Park. Although you may not be able to destroy them all, you can whittle down their numbers by eliminating 30 of them.
Confirmation of the Test Results
Please ask the Physics Teacher (SG) for confirmation once you finish the test.
Eliminate the Jacksons
Herds of monsters are lurking around and wreaking havoc in the area. Please help eliminate those monsters.
Eliminating the Jacksons
A lot of people were attacked by the Jacksons around the Park. Although you may not be able to eliminate all of them, but you can whittle them down by eliminating 1 of them.
Confirmation of the Test Results
Please ask the Physics Teacher (SG) for confirmation once you finish the test.
Special Agent's Request
Please ask the Sacred Financial Group's Special Agent at the main entrance about the situation at Leonair Campus so that you can control the unbalanced power there.
Entering Leonair Campus
The situation at Leonair Campus is worse compared to the other Campuses. There use to be a lot of living people inside Leonair Campus, so please try to explore the campus.
Collecting the Bandages
There are many Mummies around here. Please prepare 20 bandages to make a sample. Be careful since you could get poisoned by Mummies.
Delivering the Bandages

Please send the bandages to the Special Agent waiting at the entrance of Leonair Campus once you collect them. They might provide very important information that might help in solving the current situation.
Special Agent's Test

It is believed that something happened at Leonair Campus is the main cause of all the problems. All personnel that was sent by the Sacred Financial Group must also pass the skills test before entering Leonair Campus, so please try your best to get confirmation.
Special Agent's Test
Try to eliminate 20 Sacred Gate Defenders within 40 minutes. Be careful of the Sacred Gate Defender's primary attacks which use electricity.
Confirmation of the Test Results
Please ask the Special Agent for confirmation once you complete the test.
Investigate Leonair Campus

Please bring back the leaves of the Smallpox for the Sacred Financial Group's Special Agent to control the unbalanced power from Leonair Campus. The Smallpox is not the only plant in the Campus, but it might be the cause of the problems.
Finding Smallpox Leaves
Please collect 5 leaves from the Smallpox at Leonair Campus. They might provide important information that will help understand the situation at the Campus.
Delivering the Leaves
Please give 5 leaves to the Special Agent once you obtain them.
Investigate the Leonair Campus Main Center

Although most people know about part of the situation at the Campus, the incident that happened there is largely still a mystery. The Student Director of Leonair Campus might be able to help you if he is still at the Admin Office. Please go and find him.
Investigate Leonair Campus Main Center
You must find the Leonair Student Director in the Campus. He might be able to help you.
Spirit's Request

It seems that some protective spell was cast on Leonair campus before the mutations happened. You will need a spell note to pass through the spell and enter the Campus. The Spirit knows about this incident, so please ask for his help to get the spell note.
Spirit's Request 1
The procedure of making a spell note can only be remembered by reading a book. Please get the encyclopedia from the Poison Ivy nearby.
Delivering the Encyclopedia
Please give 2 encyclopedias to the Spirit and accept his request.
Spirit's Request 2
You need 8 Shadow Crow's Feathers to make the spell note. Please search for the Shadow Crow's Feathers around the area.
Delivering the Feathers
Please bring 8 Shadow Crow's Feathers to the Spirit. Now you can make the spell note that will enable you to enter the Campus.
Recover the Videotape
I've heard that the Videotape that recorded the incident can still be found, but you'll need to find a key first to get that Videotape.
Getting the Key
According to the Student Director, the Leonair Technical Teacher has the key that you need. You can find the Technical Teacher at the 2nd floor of Leonair Campus.
The Teacher's Request
The Technical Teacher requires you to get some food for him in exchange for the key. Collect some food from the Boneys around the area.
Trading with Food
Please give the food to the Technical Teacher and exchange it for the Key.
Delivering the Key
Give the key to the Student Director to get the Videotape.
Recovering the Key

Just as the Student Director feared, the key is already bent, and the tape can't be taken out. Find the Zopar in Leonair Campus in order to recover the key. You can find him at the 2nd Floor of Leonair Campus.
Getting the Videotape
After recovering the Key, please give it to the Students Director and get the Videotape back.
The Zopar's Request
The Zopar is thinking of what he needs to do with the empty classroom. Please help him find what he needs.
Zopar's Request 1
As requested by the Zopar, please find a towel in the Locker Room on the 1st floor of Leonair Campus. You can find it on the seat the Locker Custodian's seat.
Delivering the Towel
Please deliver the towel to the Zopar and accept his next request.
Zopar's Request 2
The Zopar requires his Gloves in order to do some of his work. Please find the Gloves at the Leonair Campus Welfare Society.
Delivering the Gloves
Please give the Gloves to the Zopar once you find them.
The Red Bead
After completing the Zopar's requests, please give the red bead to the Student Director.
Transmitting the Videotape

The Videotape ape may contain vital information regarding the incidents that occurred inside Leonair Campus, but it seems to be damaged and needs to be restored. Bring the Videotape to the Special Agent waiting near the Leonair Campus Parking Bay.
Transmitting the Videotape
Bring the Videotape from the Admin Office of Leonair Campus, and give it to the Special Agent waiting at the Leonair Campus Parking Bay.
Request by Mr. No-Name

The person hiding inside the locker is hungry, but he doesn't want to risk going outside to find some food. Although you can't really tell if he's a ghost or a human, you still need to help him find some food.
Looking for Food
There aren't any places that sell food nearby or any kind of food storage. You'll have to get some food from the Janitors in the area.
Delivering the Food
Please deliver the food to the person hiding inside the locker.
Videotape Recovery

You must restore the damaged Videotape from Leonair Campus. Unfortunately, you cannot ask for help from the Sacred Financial Group. Please ask for help from the Image Expert at the Trading Hole. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Look for the Image Expert
From what I've heard, the Image Expert is running a Videotape Rental shop at the Trading Hole. Seek his help to recover the tape.
Through the Tunnel

You must pass through the Sacred Hole tunnel that is filled with vicious dogs and aggressive hordes to get to the Trading Hole. If you defeat the fiercest dog among them, then you can pass through the tunnel. Please defeat the leader of the dogs. The police have suggested using the path on the left side. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Defeat the Corrupted Hound
Defeating the Corrupted Hound is the only way to pass through the tunnel. You must complete the mission within the time limit because of the broken gas tube in the tunnel.
Image Expert's Request

The Image Expert's daughter has a spore allergy and is feeling ill. He won't be able to restore the tape until she feels better. Please help him find the cause of the illness. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Gathering Information from the Police Station
Get more information by asking around at the Police Station.
The Sacred Financial Group's Special Agent
Please meet the Special Agent and get more information since the illness might be related to the Leonair Campus incident.
Image Expert's Request

The Image Expert's daughter has a spore allergy and is feeling ill. He won't be able to restore the tape until she feels better. Please help him find the cause of the illness. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Gathering Information from the Police Station
Get more information by asking around at the Police Station.

Please meet the Special Agent and get more information since the illness might be related to the Leonair Campus incident.

Gathering Information from the Police Station
Get more information by asking around at the Police Station.
The Sacred Financial Group's Special Agent
Please meet the Special Agent and get more information since the illness might be related to the Leonair Campus incident.
Obtain the Leonair College ID Card

You must first acquire the Leonair College ID Card to enter the 3rd floor of Leonair Campus. Please find the Student Director of Sacred Gate Campus and borrow it from him. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Find the Student Director of Sacred Gate Campus

The ID card that will allow you to enter Leonair Campus is kept by the Sacred Gate Student Director. The Student Director usually won't let you have this ID card, but he'll let you have it given this circumstances.
Basement 2 of Leonair Campus

The information related to the spore allergy might be found at the basement of Leonair Campus. Find the cause of the allergy at Basement 2 of Leonair Campus. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Elevator
A special elevator located on the 3rd floor is used to access Basement 2 of Leonair Campus. Find the location of the elevator.
The Secret Code
You need a secret code to make the elevator work. Go and ask the Leonair Student Director about the code.
Searching for the Secret Code
The Student Director copied the secret code on a memo, but an Iron Man 28 on the 3rd floor took it. Please get the memo from the Iron Men to get the secret code.
Proceed to Basement 2
Please enter the Secret Code into the elevator of Leonair Campus. There might be some abnormal enemies in the basement, so please be very careful.
Cleaning the Spores
The air from Basement 2 is filled with the spreading spores. Please find the source of the spores. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Entering the Basement 2
Use the elevator to descend to Basement 2. There might be some new enemies waiting underground, so please be very careful.
Cleaning the Basement 2
Follow the smell of the spores from Basement 2, and try to clean the air by eliminating the Trapper Plants. You must also gather some spores in order to make the necessary medication for the allergy.
Making the Medication
Bring the collected spores to the Nurse (Ring) at Sacred Gate Hole, and then ask her to make the medication.
Producing the Medications for the Allergy
You must first gather the necessary ingredients in order to make the medication. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Ingredients

According to the Nurse, you must gather the ingredients in order to make the medicine for the allergy. The ingredients are the Cordy's saliva, the Freezing Halogen's saliva, the WereWolf's saliva, and the feather of the Shadow Crow.
Delivering the Ingredients
Please deliver the ingredients to the Nurse and ask her to make the medicine. It won't take long to make the medicine once you bring her everything she needs.
Delivering the Medication
Please deliver the medicine to the Image Expert at the Trading Hole.
Videotape Recovery

The Image Expert has decided to restore the Videotape for you as thanks for helping him cure his daughter. Please help him fix the videotape by providing him with the equipment he needs. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Video Player
Special equipment is needed to restore the Videotape. Someone at the Police Station can provide you with what you need.
Delivering the Video Player
Please deliver the video player from the Police Station and give it to the Image Expert.
Sending the Videotape
Please bring the Videotape to the Student Director (SG), and let him to watch it first.
Bring the Videotape to the Special Agent
Bring the roll of tape that was left by the Student Director, and give it to the Special Agent waiting at Leonair Campus entrance.
Videotape Recovery

Please bring the Videotape to the Student Director (MP), and let him to watch it first.

Bring the roll of tape that was left by Student Director and give it to the Special Agent waiting at Leonair Campus entrance.

Please bring the Videotape to the Student Director (Phoenix), and let him to watch it first.
Bring the Videotape to the Special Agent
Bring the roll of tape that was left by Student Director and give it to the Special Agent waiting at Leonair Campus entrance.
Training Order

The Special Agent feels that the situation has gotten worse after watching the Videotape, and wants the students to train even more. Please go to the Trading Hole for more training. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Brawler Agent
Find the Brawler Agent for more training to help you grow more powerful.
Training Order

The Special Agent feels that the situation has gotten worse after watching the Videotape, and wants the students to train even more. Please go to the Trading Hole for more training. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Sword Agent
Find the Sword Agent for more training to help you grow more powerful.

Training Order

Finding the Shaman Agent
Find the Shaman Agent for more training to help you grow more powerful.
The Lessons of the Brawler Agent
Please follow the instructions given by the Agent. Pay close attention to these lessons as they are an important part of your training. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting GPS
Please get the GPS from Skating Boys or Skating Masters.
Searching for the Petrol Station
Please move to the GPS coordinates, 71, 105, and confirm the location of the Petrol Station at the Trading Hole.
Searching for Trading Hole No.2
The GPS shows the coordinates, 60, 117, at the Trading Hole. Go there to confirm the location of Trading Hole No.2
Searching for the Combination Sports Center
The GPS shows the coordinates, 96, 143 at the Trading Hole. Go there to confirm the location of the Combination Sports Center.
Searching for the Buried Items
The GPS shows the coordinates, 116, 170, at the Trading Hole. Go there to find buried items around that area.
Delivering the Space and Time Capsule
Follow the instructions to find the Space and Time Capsule, and then bring it back to the Agent.
The Lessons of the Sword Agent
Please follow the instructions given by the Agent. Pay close attention to these lessons as they are an important part of your training. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting GPS
Please get the GPS from the Skating Boys or Skating Masters.
Searching for the Police Station
Please move to the GPS coordinates, 121, 89, and confirm the location of the Police Station at the Trading Hole.
Searching for the Convenience Shop
The GPS shows the coordinates, 119, 113 at the Trading Hole. Go there to confirm the location of the Convenience Shop.
Searching for Trading Hole No. 4
The GPS shows the coordinates, 133, 117 at the Trading Hole. Go there to confirm the location of Trading Hole No. 4
Searching for the Buried Items
The GPS shows the coordinates, 105, 164 at the Trading Hole. Go there to find buried Items around that area.
Delivering the Space and Time Capsule
Follow the instructions to find the Space and Time Capsule, and then bring it back to the Agent.

Delivering the Space and Time Capsule
Follow the instructions to find the Space and Time Capsule, and then bring it back to the Agent.
Report to the Police Station
You received a message from the Police Station. Go and find the nearby Trading Hole Police Station to respond to their call. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Trading Hole Police Station
According to the Shaman Trainer's instructions, you must go to the Trading Hole Police Station and see what's bothering them.
Recycling the Letter
The police need your help to get a very important letter since they lack manpower. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Retrieving the Letter
Please get the letter from the Skating Master.
Delivering the Letter
Please return the important letter to the Policeman at the Trading Hole Police Station.
Searching for the Pieces of the Letter
You must gather 6 pieces of the letter from the Skating Master in order to understand its content.
Delivering the Letter Pieces
Please bring 6 pieces of the letter to the Trading Hole Police Station.
The Police's Request

The Police Station requested you to find some information regarding the missing children. This will be a difficult job, but please try to collect as much information as you can get. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Image Expert
Please find the Image Expert since he might have some information regarding the incident.
Visit the Cleaner
Meet the Cleaner at the Trading Hole Residential Square, and ask him for any news about the lost children.
Visit the Hotdog Hawker
Meet the Hotdog Hawker at the Trading Hole Residential Square, and ask him for any news about the lost children.
Sending the Proposal
After completing the visits, go back to the Police Station and give the proposal.
Getting the Back-up Disk

You can use the Police Information Database to find information regarding the incident, but the machine can't be used properly because of a programming error. You must get the back-up disk from the Mystic Peak Student Director to reset the program. Please get the disk at Mystic Peak Campus.
Delivering the Back-up Disk
Bring the disk to the Police Station to restore normal operation to the database machine.
Investigating the Loose Halogen
A big dog has recently bitten into a child's shirt. This news might be related to the lost children, so please go and investigate the Loose Halogen.
Delivering the Recovered Things
Give the things recovered from the Loose Halogen to the Police Station. These things might be connected to the lost children.
Investigate the Experimental Object

The DNA with one of the children has been found in the Loose Halogen's saliva. To get more information about the experiment and its relation to the Sacred Financial Group, you must go to Sacred Gate Campus and ask the teachers about the experiment. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Visit the Student Director
Go to Sacred Gate Campus and meet the Student Director to ask him about the experiments.
Visit the Technical Teacher
Go to the Sacred Gate Campus junction and meet the Technical Teacher to ask him about the experiments.
Visit the Physics Teacher
Go to Sacred Gate Ring and meet the Physics Teacher to ask him about the experiment.
Back to the Trading Hole Police Station
Go back to the Police Station at the Trading Hole, and try to find more information by using the Police Database.
Collect the Food

The Hotdog Hawker said that all the food ingredients have been stolen. Please find the ingredients so that the Hotdog Hawker can cook and sell food again. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Searching for the Food Ingredients
The Skating Masters and Skating Boys have stolen the ingredients from the Hotdog Hawker. Please get 10 Breads and Meats from them.
Delivering the Ingredients
Please deliver the Hotdog Ingredients to the Hotdog Hawker.
Cleaning the Streets
Some people are making the area messier by throwing trash on the street. Please try to solve this problem by eliminating the monsters involved. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Trash
The Skating Masters, Skating Boys, and Got Milks are littering trash on the street. Try to clean the street by collecting trash from the Skating Masters, Skating Boys, and Got Milks.
Delivering the Trash
Please give the Trash to the Cleaner at Trading Hole Residential Square.
Collecting Empty Bottles

The citizens aren't doing as much as they used, meaning that there's also been less recycling around here. Collect the glass bottles and help recycle them. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Bottles
Get the glass bottles back from the Loose Halogens and Hodels.
Delivering the Bottles
Please bring the glass bottles to the Ice Cream Seller at the Trading Hole Residential Square.
The Stolen Book
The book entitled "Online Game Manual" was stolen. Please get that book back to its rightful owner. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Recovering the Book
The book entitled "Online Game Manual" was stolen by the Cripple Guys. Please get that book back to its rightful owner.
Delivering the Book
Please give the book entitled "Online Game Manual" to Master Zheng, who is waiting in front of the bookstore at the Trading Hole.

Recovering the Book

Delivering the Book
Please give the book entitled "Windows Game Programming Tricks" to Master Zheng, who is waiting in front of the bookstore at the Trading Hole.
Finding the Warehouse Key

A large dog snatched the Warehouse Key from the Cleaner. Now the Cleaner can't perform his daily tasks since he needs that key to access his cleaning tools. Please find the key and get it back to him. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Key of the Warehouse
It looks like the Loose Halogen is the one that took away the key to the Warehouse. Please go find the Loose Halogen and retrieve the missing key.
Returning the Warehouse Key
Please get the Warehouse Key from the Loose Halogen, and bring it back to the Cleaner at the Trading Hole Residential Square.
Returning the Trash

The Cleaner accidentally disposed a pile of Trash that was not intended for disposal. It was found that someone took possession of that Trash. Please search the nearby area and retrieve the Trash. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Trash
The Wrestler snatched the Trash that wasn't supposed to be thrown away. Please acquire this Trash because the Cleaner can do something useful with it.
Returning the Trash
Please give the Trash back to the Cleaner.
Confiscating the Golf Clubs

It was found that numerous Golf Enthusiasts were found causing too much trouble at the streets. Please confiscate and collect their Golf Clubs to neutralize their violence. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Golf Club Confiscation
It was found that a group of nasty Golf enthusiasts that carry Gold Rods are causing havoc in the streets. Please collect 20 Gold Rods from the Golf Bombers.
Giving the Golf Clubs
Please give the Gold Rods to the Cleaner located at the Trading Hole Residential Square.
Resident's Request
I've heard that the Hunk Baldies are trying to attack the citizens in the area. Please help chase the Hunk Baldies away. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Eliminate the Hunk Baldies
The Hunk Baldies are violently attacking the residents near the Golf Field area. Please defeat them to ensure the resident's safety.
Confirm the Residents' Safety
Please report to the Cleaner after you defeat the Hunk Baldies and confirm the safety of the residents.
Finding the Truck's Key

While the Truck Driver was trying to fix the Truck when it suddenly broke down, a giant dog known as the Loose Halogen snatched the key to the Truck. Please find it and return it to the Truck Driver. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Missing Key
The Loose Halogen took away the key to the Truck. Retrieve the Key from the Loose Halogen, and give it back to the Truck Driver.
Return the Truck's Key
Please give the missing Truck Key back to the Truck Driver.
Recycling the Gasoline
The basic repairs for the Truck are finished! The Truck, however, cannot move without Gasoline. You can get Gasoline Supplies around this area. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Gasoline Supplies
I've heard that you can get gasoline from the Fishermen nearby. Please be careful, and deliver the Gasoline Supplies immediately.
Delivering the Gasoline
Please deliver the Gasoline Supplies to the Truck Driver.
Repairing the Truck

Although the Truck was just repaired, it suddenly broke down again. This is weird! Now, the Truck won't even start. Please find the components needed to fix the Truck again. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Accessories
Go to Wharf No.1, and then search for the components needed to repair the Truck. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. Please try searching the map coordinates, 46, 112.
Looking for the Components

Go to Wharf No.1, and then search for the components needed to repair the Truck. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. Look for Gasoline that can replace the Lubricant Oil. Please try searching the map coordinates, 43, 107.
Looking for the Generator Parts
Go to Wharf No.1, and then search for the components needed to repair the Truck. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. Please try searching the map coordinates, 44, 120.
Delivering the Components
Please deliver the Gasoline it to the Truck Driver as soon as you can.
Visiting the Old Man
You must find a mysterious old man to repair the truck. According to rumor, he is located near the Freezing Warehouse. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Visit the Old Man

An old man is interested in meeting you because he believes you have information regarding the Sacred Financial Group. He lives at the Bus Station near the Freezing Warehouse. You should be able to locate him in that area.
Water Quality Check

Upon meeting the old man, he tells you that he needs to check the water quality at the Water Purification Center, and asks you to find a bottle in some unknown location. I'm not sure if there's a special reason for finding the bottle or if this is some kind of test, but please find that bottle. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Bottle
To check the function of the Water Purification Center, please acquire the bottle located near the Water Purification Center between the Freezing Storage.
Delivering the Empty Bottle
Please give the Bottle to the old man waiting near the Bus Stop.
Repairing the Generator

After the old man confirms that the bottle is the one he wants, he says that the Power Generator can't be started and needs to be repaired. He requests you to help him collect the components needed for the repairs. Please try your best to collect the components that he requires. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Looking for the Generator Components

Go to the Ship at Wharf No.2, and look for the components that can be used to start the Generator. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. I believe that the components used for the old generators can be used temporarily. Please try searching the map coordinates, 56, 85.
Looking for the Generator Components

Go to the Ship at Wharf No.2, and look for the components that can be used to start the Generator. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. I believe that Gasoline and Oil supplies are also needed to keep the Generator function properly. Please try searching the map coordinates, 49, 86.
Looking for the Generator Components

Go to the Ship at Wharf No.2, and look for the components that can be used to start the Generator. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. If you managed to find an empty bottle that can replace the water bottle that was previously brought back before, it would really help a lot! Please try searching the map coordinates, 65, 86.
Replacing the Water Bottle

Use the empty bottle you found to replace the bottle that had been brought back before. We need it to investigate the function of the Water Purification Center. Please try searching the map coordinates, 103, 74.
Delivering the Components
Please bring all the components to the old man located near the Bus Stop. These components will be used to repair the Water Purification Center facilities.
The Videotape of the Green Secret Headquarters

It's believed that the conflict between the students and the Green Secret Headquarters started when the mutations happened. The CCTV in the building recorded the entire incident, proving that the conflict occurred. Go to the top floor of the Green Secret Headquarters and search for the Videotape. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Looking for the Surveillance Video
I think the videotape that contains the surveillance record is located on the 3rd floor of the Green Secret Headquarters. Get it from the Bunny Girls, Ninja (F), and Steel Heads.
Returning the Surveillance Record
Please bring the Videotape to the old man located at the Bus Stop next to the Freezing Warehouse. We can now finally understand what is going on with the information on the Videotape.
Videotape Recovery

Although you found the Videotape, it is in pretty bad condition and can't be read. Please bring it to the Image Expert at the Trading Hole Videotape Shop to restore it to working order. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Image Expert
Proceed to the Image Expert located at the Trading Hole, and ask him to recover the videotape so that we can use it in our investigation.
Searching for the Recovery Oil

Go to the ship at Wharf No.3 and search for the Videotape Recovery Oil. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. Please try searching the map coordinates, 50, 56. You will need 3 Oil Bottles.
Searching for the Recovery Oil

Go to the ship at Wharf No.3 and search for the Videotape Recovery Oil. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. Please try searching the map coordinates, 49, 58. You still need 2 Oil Bottles.
Searching for the Recovery Oil

Go to the ship at Wharf No.3 and search for the Videotape Recovery Oil. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. Please try searching the map coordinates, 59, 58. Please find the last Oil Bottle you need.
Returning the Oil
Please bring all 3 bottles of the Recovery Oil to the Image Expert at the Trading Hole Videotape Shop. Ask him to restore the videotape so that we can use it in our investigation.
Returning the Videotape
Once the Videotape is restored, bring it to the old man located near the Bus Stop of the Wharf Passage.
Confiscation of Smuggled Goods

I've heard people talking about smuggling activities at the port. It's great that you students are here to help because I want to check it out, but there aren't enough people on the force to do it. Please help me investigate the area. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Finding the Smuggled Goods
Go to the ship at Wharf No. 4, and check for any illegal goods. You should be able to find what you need on the ship deck. Please try searching the map coordinates, 71, 20.
Returning the Smuggled Goods

This stuff looks like trash, but still it looks slightly suspicious. Please bring these to the Policeman on duty at the entrance of the Control Room (Green Secret Headquarters) located at 96, 37 of the Wharf Passage.
Catching Smugglers
The smuggling activities at Wharf No. 4 have been confirmed. Please arrest the Violent Baldies hanging around the shipping area. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Catching the Smugglers
Arrest the Violent Baldies located at Wharf No. 4.
Reporting the Smuggler's Location
Please talk to the Police near the Control Rooms and report the location of the smuggler.
Investigating the Building
The Control Room Building was said to be the entrance to the Green Secret Headquarters. We still need to procure more evidence for a warrant. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Search for the Evidence
The Control Room Building is behind the Policeman. Go there and look for any information about the Green Secret Headquarters. Please try searching the map coordinates, 88, 26.
Search for the Evidence
Check the area near the Control Room Building to look for any signs of the Green Secret Headquarters, but be careful. Please try searching the map coordinates, 90, 40.
Returning the Evidence
Please give the evidence that you've collected to the Police.
Investigate the Green Secret Headquarters

You must pass through all the security surveillance of the building to enter the Green Secret Foothold. Although the security surveillance system can't even be breached by the toughest Police Officer, you might be able to get through it with the proper identification permit. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Getting the Identification Program
Go to the Trading Hole Police Station and take the Identification Program prepared by the investigators.
Accessing the Building
Insert the Identification Program into the Authentication Terminal in order to gain access to the Control Room Building, which is also known as the Green Secret Foothold.
The "Green" Secret Foothold

The Control Room, also known as the Green Secret Foothold, is composed of 3 floors, and each floor is equipped with a simple security system. Each floor requires its own key before you can enter it. Go to the 1st floor to find the 2nd floor key. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Searching for the Keys
Go the 1st floor and look for the Keys needed to access the 2nd Floor. It is believed that the monsters' known as Ice Tyrant, Violent Baldie and Violent Girl in that area carry these keys.
Repairing the Keys
Go to the Warehouse Keeper in front of the building, and ask him to repair the keys.
Identify the Keys
Bring the keys to the Policeman and confirm whether the keys can be used to reach the 2nd Floor.
The 2nd Floor of the "Green" Secret Foothold
It's very likely that important documents are stored on the 2nd Floor. Try to get any useful information from the monsters on the 2nd floor. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Searching for the Keys
The access keys to the 3rd Floor can be found on the 2nd Floor. Try to collect the keys from the monster known as Death Reaper, Violent Baldie, Violent Girl and Ninja (M) on the 2nd Floor.
Repairing the Keys
Go to the Warehouse Keeper in front of the building, and ask him to repair the keys.
Identify the Keys
Bring the keys to the Policeman and confirm whether the keys can be used to reach the 3rd Floor.
The 3rd Floor of the "Green" Secret Foothold
It's very likely that important documents are stored on the 3rd Floor. Try to get any useful information from the monsters on the 3rd floor. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Searching for the Documents

We found out that the documents we need were torn into pieces. You need 7 of these Letter Fragments to put the entire document together again. Please find the 7 pieces of the Letter Fragments from the Ninja (F), Steel Head, Saint Gambler, and Bunny Girl.
Returning the Documents
Deliver the documents to the Policeman located at the entrance of the building.
Returning the Evidence
The sender of the letter is a very famous person. It might contain useful information, so please report to the Trading Hole Police Station. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Delivering the Letter
Deliver the Letter to the Police Station at the Trading Hole. Please pay attention to the sender and recipient's name.
Identifying the Letter's Recipient
Give the letter to Ang Bee Lan at the Trading Hole Residential District to identify its recipient. Listen to the advice she has to give you. Please try searching the map coordinates, X: 129 Y: 139.
The Guard's Request

A Sacred Gate Defender guard says there is a group of people in front of the Control Room Building that are impersonating him and trying to harass other people. Proceed to the Sacred Gate Hole to confiscate the SG Defender's Batons. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Batons
Go to the Sacred Gate Hole to eliminate Sacred Gate Defender and confiscate their Batons for the Security Guard.
Giving the Batons
Give the Batons to the Guard near the Control Room.
The Guard's Request

A Sacred Gate Defender guard says there is a group of people in front of the Control Room Building that are impersonating him and trying to harass other people. Proceed to the Sacred Gate Hole to confiscate the SG Defender's Batons. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Batons
Go to the Sacred Gate Hole to eliminate Sacred Gate Defender and confiscate their Batons for the Security Guard.
Giving the Batons
Give the Batons to the Guard near the Control Room.

A Sacred Gate Defender guard says there is a group of people in front of the Control Room Building that are impersonating him and trying to harass other people. Proceed to the Sacred Gate Hole to confiscate the SG Defender's Batons. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Batons
Go to the Sacred Gate Hole to eliminate Sacred Gate Defender and confiscate their Batons for the Security Guard.
Giving the Batons
Give the Batons to the Guard near the Control Room.
The Guard's Request

A Sacred Gate Defender guard says there is a group of people in front of the Control Room Building that are impersonating him and trying to harass other people. Proceed to the Sacred Gate Hole to confiscate the SG Defender's Batons. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Batons
Go to the Sacred Gate Hole to eliminate Sacred Gate Defender and confiscate their Batons for the Security Guard.
Giving the Batons
Give the Batons to the Guard near the Control Room.
The First Test
A lady called Ang Bee Lan says that you need to pass a certain examination before we can ask any questions to find out about the letter's recipient. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Search for the Three Dogs' Saliva and the Shadow Crow's Feather

The Test will evaluate how well you can handle the surrounding area. Please collect the saliva from Cordy, Freezing Halogen and Werewolf, together with the Shadow Crow's feathers within 30 minutes. Time will start counting down as soon as you accept this task.
Identify the Collected Items
Collect all the items that you've retrieved and give them to Ang Bee Lan at the Residential Street. Ask her to identify what you collected.
The Second Test
You will be collecting the Medicine Pills for the Second Test. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Collecting the Medicine Pills
A group of enchanted Jesters seem to have taken the Medicine Pills. It is your duty to locate the Freezing Clowns and retrieve those Pills. Good Luck!
Giving the Pills
Please give 10 Pills to Ang Bee Lan in the Residential District, and ask her to confirm that you've completed the task.
The Final Test
The Final Test will identify the kind of power that you have. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Eliminating 15 Hunk Baldies
You must eliminate 15 Hunk Baldies located at the Nine Hall Club to complete the Final Test. You are expected to accomplish this within 10 minutes. Once you are done, get approval from Ang Bee Lan.
Final Test Accomplishments
Once you are done with the Final Test, talk to Ang Bee Lan who is located at the Trading Hole Residential District to get her approval.
File Report on Found Objects
Find a corpse that looks your age, holding an ore that appears to be very precious. Afterwards, report to the nearest Policeman in the vicinity.
Give the Ore to the Trading Hole Police Station for Safekeeping
File a Report on the Ore found in the hand of the Corpse at the Police Station.
Sacred Financial Group Private Jail
The ore held by the corpse might be a special ore dug from the Sacred Financial Group's Private Jail. Check if the ore is indeed special by checking the area around the Private Jail.
Confirm the Ore at the Jail Mine
Proceed to the Jail Vicinity to check if the ore is a special ore that came from the jail's mine.
Give the Ore to the Trading Hole Police Station
Please give the ore to the Police Station for safekeeping.
Report Violent Criminals
The workers that attacked the town's citizens have fled towards the jail area. Please arrest them and report this incident to the police.

Find the guys who have created this riot and disappeared.
Defeat 6 Dispatched Panday Hepe
Find the guys who have created this riot and disappeared.

Gathering Pieces of Information

Report on Prison Escapees
There are targets on the Prisoners' list that need special attention. Neutralize these targets first to prevent any casualties.

Check if the Weapon Shop Owner's Friend is Hurt
The Weapon Shop Owner's friend might have been hurt. The Weapon Shop Owner speculates that this might have happened to other people, and requested you to investigate the area where he was last found.
Investigate the Scene of the Incident
Find out if the Weapon Shop Owner's friend was murdered. Please check the area, and tell the police in the vicinity where the Weapon Shop Owner's friend died.
Search the Scene of the Incident
See if there are other victims in the vicinity.
Report Status
Please report to the Trading Hole Police Station after checking the scene of the incident.
Retrieve the Confidential Documents

Confidential documents were snatched by Lards while they were transferred from the College to the Financial Group. You don't know exactly what they are, but the documents were clearly very important. You must retrieve the documents as soon as possible.
Obtain Confidential Information
The secret documents were stolen, please retrieve them from Panday Chief, Dispatched Panday Chief.
Submit Retrieved Documents
Please retrieve the stolen documents and return them to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Confirm the Security of Middle Hole
It is necessary to check the security at Middle Hole. Please go to Middle Hole and perform a thorough security examination.
Examine the Scene of the Incident

What happened at Middle Hole was very serious, and it requires a thorough examination. Please begin your investigation in the vicinity of the scene of the Weapon Shop Owner's case. There are still cars that are in flames due to the incident. Please pay extra notice to the surroundings of these vehicles.
Examine the Scene of the Incident

Please begin your investigation in the vicinity of the scene of the Weapon Shop Owner's case. There are still cars that are in flames due to the incident. Please pay extra notice to the surroundings of these vehicles.
Search the Scene of the Incident

Please search the scene of the incident with extra careful attention. Please begin you investigation at the scene of the Weapon Shop Owner's case. There are still cars in flames due to the incident. Please pay extra attention to the surroundings of these cars.
Report Investigation Results
Please give your report on the info you gathered to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Investigate the Case
All the vehicles in the street seem to have been affected by the fire. It appears that the fire has yet died down or been extinguished. Look for unaffected vehicles and gather evidence.
Secure Evidence
Please look for physical evidence from the cars by extinguishing the Fire.
Present Evidence to the Police Station
Once you have found reliable evidence, please report to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Repair Walkie Talkies

Clear communication lines are necessary in many emergency situations. Walkie talkies are used to facilitate communication, but they became faulty after the riot. The Image Expert is needed to repair the walkie talkies.
Request to Repair Walkie Talkies
Walkie talkies are the main means of communication of the police, but they became faulty after the riot. Please look for the Image Expert.
Look for Spare Parts
The spare parts needed to repair the Walkie Talkies are stored in the Trading Hole Multi Sports Center. Please go there and find them.
Request to have the Walkie Talkies Repaired
Give the spare parts to the Image Expert, and ask him to help repair the Walkie Talkies.
Fixed Walkie Talkies
The walkie talkies are finally fixed. Return to the Trading Hole Police Station as soon as possible.
Go to the Trading Hole Police Station
Once the walkie talkies are repaired, please give them to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Rescue Policeman's Companion
The Policeman in front of the Jail managed to escape from the Jail mob. He has asked you to rescue his companion.
Rescue Policeman's Companion
The Police officer's companion is in the middle of a jail mob and can't escape. Please help the Police officer by searching for his companion in the Central Tower.
Relay the Status of the Situation
The prisoners already killed the Policeman's companion... You must inform him about this tragedy...
Request from the Police
Upon learning that his companion was killed, the Police has asked you to seek out the murderer.
Find the Suspect
Please return to the jail and look for the companion's killer. Based on witness accounts, the killer headed to the jail's balcony. That should be the first place where you should look.
Convey Status
The killer was found, but he claims not to anything and is innocent. He asserts that he felt as if he was controlled by some powerful force. Please let the Jail Warden know about this.
Report Status of Jail
The Jail has fallen into a deplorable state because of the riot. You have been asked to relay this information to the Middle Hole Police Station.
Convey Status of Jail
The prisoners in the jail also rioted after the riot in the streets. Please let the Trading Hole Police Station know about this.
Report Status of Jail
The Jail has fallen into a deplorable state because of the riot. You have been asked to relay this information to the Middle Hole Police Station.
