Look for the Jail Warden
Please look for the Policeman in front of the jail for help in order to further understand the Jail's condition.
Investigate Central Jail Tower
Please follow the Jail Warden's instructions, and begin your investigation at the Central Tower of the jail so that the police can learn more about the Jail's facilities.
Investigate Underground Operation Center Entrance
Please search the Operating Center Entrance at the back of the jail.
Relay the Status of Investigation
After searching all the Jail's facilities, please let the Jail Warden know about the outcome of your investigation.
Prepare the Final Report
The Jail Policeman indicates he needs to conduct a thorough internal investigation, and has given you instructions to investigate.
Investigate the Vicinity of the Control Tower
Start by examining the condition of the balcony of A Center.
Investigate the Vicinity of the Control Tower
Examine the condition of the balcony of B Center.
Investigate the Vicinity of the Control Tower
Examine the condition of the balcony of C Center.
Investigate the Vicinity of the Control Tower
Finally, examine the condition of the balcony of D Center.
Inform Jail Police of the Status
Once you have completed investigation of the internal facilities, please let the Jail Police know of the findings.
Submit the Final Report
After examining all the areas as instructed, please submit the final report to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Unlock Security Device
The Jail Warden brought along an important box when he escaped, but the key to the box and the CD have disappeared. Quickly help him find the key and CD so that he can unlock the box.
Look for the Keys
The Jail Warden needs the Key to open the box that he has taken with him. Please get the Key from the Red Thieves, Black Thieves, and Machinery Thieves.
Look for the CD
You still need the CD to open the 2nd layer of the security equipment. Please find the CD from the Red Thieves, Black Thieves, and Machinery Thieves.
Give the Items to the Jail Warden
Give the Key and the CD to the Jail Warden so that he can finally open the security box.
Look for the Suspect
There is a letter written with blood next to Policeman's corpse in the Jail. The letter insists that the suspect must be caught. Please collect info and search for the suspect.
Search for Clues
Please use the blood-written letter of the Policeman to track down the Prisoner. Please thoroughly check the area where the corpse was located.
Look for the Clues Again
Please thoroughly search the vicinity of where the corpse was again.
Look for More Clues Again
Once again, please thoroughly search the vicinity of where the corpse was.
Look for the Suspect
Please give the clues you obtained to the Jail Warden to identify the Suspect.
Arrest Prison Supervisor
According to the Jail Warden and the other clues, the Prison Supervisor is the suspect. Please arrest the Prison Supervisor.
Report the Status of the Arrest
Please let the Jail Warden know once you have arrested the Suspect.
Look for the Backpack Key
The bags of accessories that the nurses bring are locked and the Cold Wolves have eaten the keys. Please get the keys back.
Retrieving the Key
The bags of accessories are locked and the Cold Wolves that are in the Prison area have eaten the keys. Please get the keys back.
Give the key to the Middle Hole Nurse
Please give the key to the Nurse at Middle Hole.
Identify the Letter Pad
A strange letter is believed to contain a very important message. It has been torn into pieces, however, and you must quickly find all of its pieces to decipher the message.
Identify other 6 Missing Pieces of the Letter Pad
Please find the missing parts of the strange letter. Big Boy Maso or Totoy Bato has this missing parts.
Give the 6 Missing Pieces

Give the Letter Pad to the Trading Hole Police Station

Gather Red Rosary
There are rumours that Light Inducers are carrying around red spheres in Root Hole. Please collect the red spheres.
Gather Blood Dagger
There are rumours that Fire Ninjas are carrying around blood stained sword in Root Hole. Please collect the blood stained sword.
Transfer Materials
Please give the Materials to the Old Man in front of the Sacred Financial Group HQ Building
Collecting the Items
There are a few important items needed for the investigation. Please help in finding the items.
Collecting Soul Spiritual Sphere
According to the Prison's Police officer, you can obtain spheres from Panday Hepe and Dispatched Panday Hepe in the Prison area. Please collect the spheres.
Collecting Green Bead
According to the Prison's Police officer, you can obtain spheres from Black Ninja and Dispatched Black Ninja in the Prison area. Please collect the spheres.
Collecting Green Crystal
According to the Prison's Police officer, you can obtain spheres from Corrupted Parak and Corupted Pulis in the Prison area. Please collect the spheres.
Delivering the Items
Please give the items to the Jail Warden.
Using the Special Ring
You've finally made the Special Ring. You can test its use through your training.
Defeat Mad Pretty Veyah
Please defeat Mad Pretty Veyah who are located around the Head B. building in Root Hole.
Using the Special Ring
You've finally made the Special Ring. You can test its use through your training.
Defeat Mad Haring Braso
Please defeat Mad Haring Braso who are located around the Head B. building in Root Hole.
Mysterious Sacred Financial Group
All of the recent incidents are connected to the Sacred Financial Group. Investigate what it's really happening with that company.
Meet the Special Agent
Meet the social worker agent in front of LeonineCampus, and learn what you can about the Saint Foundation.
Community Service of Saint Financial Group
The Saint Financial Group sent a request through the mail. Help the construction supervisor at Sacred Gate, and then hear about the Saint Foundation's community service.
Meet the Construction Supervisor at Sacred Gate
Meet the Construction Supervisor who reports to the Sacred Financial Group at Sacred Gate.
Find the Golf Clubs
Collect the golf clubs as requested by the Construction Supervisor.
Meet the Construction Supervisor at Sacred Gate
Bring the golf clubs to the Construction Supervisor of Sacred Gate.
Meet the Special Agent
Meet the Special Agent again to learn about the Saint Financial Group's public service.
The Truth Behind the Saint Financial Group
Speak with people about the Saint Financial Group's public service.
Meet the Physics Teacher
Meet the Physics Teacher to learn about the Saint Financial Group's public service.
Meet the Nurse at the Bridge
Speak with the Nurse at the Bridge about Sacred Financial Group
Meet Banshee of Leonair Campus
Speak with Banshee of Leonair about the Sacred Financial Group.
Meet the Student Director of Leonair Campus
Meet the Student Director of Leonair Campus to learn about the Saint Financial Group's public service.
Meet the Weapon Expert in Middle Hole
Show the object that looks like proof of an experiment on a living human to the Weapon Expert at Middle Hole.
Mysterious Melody
You need to go to the Head Office to any new information regarding the unethical experiments at Leonair Campus.
Meet the old man in front of the Head Office.
Ask about how to find and enter the Head Office.
Meet the Old Man at the Wharf Passage
Speak with the old man to get one of security codes required to pass the Head Office's two security systems.
Retrieve the Code
Retrieve the code from Trump master in Hangout 3F
Meet the Old Man at the Wharf Passage
Bring the obtained code to the old man, and ask him to implant it into your body.
Meet the Image Expert
Speak with the Image Expert about the voice recognition system, the Head Office's second security system.
Meet the Old Man in Front of the Head Office
You've completed the preparations for bypassing the security systems. Speak with the old man for additional advice.
Go to the Head Office
Enter the Head Office, and activate the automatic security checking process.
Saint Financial Group Head Office Entrance
The security process is complete. Now enter Head Office 1F.
Enter the Sacred Financial Group's Head Office
You've successfully bypassed all of the security. Please enter Head Office 1F.

Search for the Student
Find the student who is waiting for you in 1F.

Ascending 90F

Find the Broken Window
Find the broken window on 90F.
Where Time Stops 1
Go to the Director Room on top of this building through the outside left wall.
Find the path to the Restroom.
Head to the Restroom through the wall outside the broken windows.
Director Room Investigation
There is nobody in this room. Investigate this room to find some useful documents.
Searching for Important Clues
Find any information that might serve as a clue inside the empty Director Room.
Underground Laboratory
You've learned how to connect to another world in the Underground Laboratory with the documents in the Director Room. Go to 1F and find the path to the Underground Laboratory.
Go to 1F
Go down to 1F through the one way passage beside the bookshelf.
Find the Underground Laboratory Entrance
Find the path that leads underground before finding the Underground Laboratory.
Find the Password
A password is required to use the elevator. Find the password from copy spirits on 30F, 50F, and 90F.
Enter the Password

Underground Investigation
The stairs are blocked and the elevator is malfunctioning. The entrance to the Underground Laboratory is probably blocked too. Continue searching for a way to enter the Underground Laboratory.
Find Clues Underground
Find a clue that will help find the passage from here to another world.
Find Laboratory

As Ji Il Chung said, the Laboratory was buried by the earthquake. It seems that some laboratory equipment and other objects were scattered outside the Underground Laboratory. Investigate those objects for clues.

Collection as much information as possible from the scattered equipment and objects.
Confirmation of Information
Show the information you collected to Ji Il Chung.

Check the Parts
Show the parts you obtained to Ji Il Chung.

Find the Stolen Dry Ice
Dry ice is very important for storing ice cream, but the dry ice kept in the warehouse has been stolen. It's now your job to find the stolen dry ice.
Searching for Dry Ice
Retrieve the stolen Dry Ice from the security guard at the Refrigeration Warehouse on the Wharf.
Deliver Dry Ice
Deliver the retrieved Dry Ice to the Ice Cream seller at the Trading Hole.
Collecting Old Books

There has been reports of wrestlers from the Trading Hole stealing old books that were collected by an avid reader over a long period of time. Find those books, and give them to Master Zheng at the Trading Hole.

Retrieve the Ancient Books

Security Guard ID Card Problem

Many people go in and out of the refrigeration warehouse on the main wharf, resulting in the warehouse operators being unable to maintain the warehouse temperature. Former security guards that still have ID cards are a major cause of this problem. Retrieve the ID Cards from former security guards so that they cannot enter the main wharf warehouse anymore.
Retrieve ID Cards
Retrieve 10 ID Cards from the Security Guards on the Main Wharf.
Deliver ID Cards
Deliver the gathered ID Cards to the Policeman at the Trading Hole.

Deliver the Oil
Deliver the oil you obtained to the Cleaner at the Trading Hole.

Investigation of the Dead Policeman

Removing the Fireworks

Delivering the Proposal
Deliver both proposals from the Technical Teacher and Physics Teacher to Lee Zhen.
Study Yin's Information
Although Lee Zhen acquired help in his study, Chui Yin Xi also needs someone to scrutinize the information.
Proceed to the Physics Teacher
Deliver the information to the Physics Teacher at Sacred Gate Hole.
Delivering the Proposal
Accept the proposal from the Physics Teacher, and deliver to it Chui Yin Xi.
Delivering the Proposal
Lee Zhen has modified and removed several key points from the teachers' proposal before delivering it to Chui Yin Xi.
Delivering the Proposal
Deliver Lee Zhen's proposal to Chui Yin Xi.
Delivering the Proposal
Although Chui Yin Xi discovered some important issues from the Sacred Gate Hole Physics Teacher, he only included his personal comments on the proposal before sending it to Lee Zhen
Delivering the Proposal
Deliver Chui Yin Xi's proposal to Lee Zhen.
Seek Hong Ji Yoon's Support
Lee Da Xu, who has yet to recover from lost memories, can only remember the name Hong Ji Yoon. The name sounds familiar to him, so he hopes the name will be a lead in restoring his memory.
Proceed to Hong Ji Yoon
Deliver the message from Lee Da Xu.
Item Delivery
Please tell Lee Da Xu the news about Hong Ji Yoon being his childhood friend, and bring along a few items from his childhood.
Persuade Amanuoruoyin
Lee Zhen realized how much Amanuoruoyin loves his sister Amanuoruoyin, and is therefore helping Amanuoruoyin send his letter to Amanuoruoyin to release him from the past sins.
Letter Delivery
Deliver Amanuoruoyin's letter to her brother, Amanuoruoyin.
Seeking Forgiveness
After receiving the letter from his sister, Amanuoruoyin seeks forgiveness, and is striving to write another letter to express his feelings to her.
Delivering the Thank You Letter
Lee Da Xu feels grateful to Hong Ji Yoon, even if his memories weren't restored from the items he received.
Delivering the Hairpin to Hong Ji Yoon
Lee Da Xu wants to send Hong Ji Yoon the hairpin that is given to him by his former students.
Collecting Accessories
After reading the proposal, Chui Yin Xi has secretly started collecting the Accessories needed for the Human Segregator without notifying Lee Zhen.

Proceed to the underground and collect some Human Segregator Accessories.

Meet Liz
Meet Liz trapped inside the underground pathway which Lucian had been guarding.
[P] Vigor of Warrior
Mysterious 'Blue soul's beads' can be acquired from Lucian. Please collect 5 and bring them back to Liz.
Receive Blue soul's beads
Retrieve 5 Blue soul's beads by eliminating Lucian.
Take it to Liz
Bring 5 Blue soul's beads back to Liz.
[P] The Gate of Another World
Dominate Gainun who is guarding the Gate of Another World and tell him about the Lucian's Conspiracy.
Dominate Gainun
Dominate Gainun
Talk to Gainun
Inform Gainun who regained his consciousness about Lucian's conspiracy.
Talk to Liz
Tell Liz what happened with Gainun.
[P] Cruel Destiny
Eliminate 50 Hillos which have lost themselves due to the Live Body Experiment conducted on them, in 30 minutes.
Eliminate Hillo
Eliminate 50 Hillos in 30 minutes.
Receive Confirmation
Get confirmation from Silent Priest
[P] Will of Invincible
Eliminate 30 Cyclops which have lost themselves due to the Live Body Experiment conducted on them, in 30 minutes.
Eliminate Cyclops
Eliminate 30 Cyclops in 30 minutes.
Receive Confirmation
Get confirmation from Silent Priest
Gather Scattered Power
Meet Garansanoa and deliver the news of Liz and what has happened so far.
Meet Garansanoa
Meet Garansanoa at Saint Research Complex.
Meet Liz
Meet Liz and deliver Garansanoa's message.
[P] Heart of Warrior

In order to control the Absolute Point which is getting unstabilized due to Lucian's influence 'Tear of Ganil' is needed. Please collect 108 'Tear of Ganil' from Arc and Cannon Buster located at the Complex Basement and bring them back to Liz.
Collect Tear of Ganil
Collect 108 Tear of Ganil by eliminating Arcs and Cannon Buster.
Take it to Liz
Bring Tear of Ganil back to Liz.
[P] Purification of Fallen Spirit
Eliminate 10 Arcs, the High Priest who have fallen due to Live Body experiment conducted on them, in 30 minutes.
Eliminate Arc
Eliminate 10 Arcs in 30 Minutes
Receive Confirmation
Get confirmation from Silent Priest
[P] Spirit of Warrior
Temper the Heart of Warrior received from Liz to make the key to the Gate of Another World. Eliminate Gainun who is guarding the gate and bring the Soulstone of spell back to Liz.
Eliminate Gainun
Eliminate Gainun and retrieve Soulstone of spell
Take it to Liz
Bring Soulstone of spell back to Liz.
Ami's Request (C)
Please help a citizen that's being threatened by suspicious men.
Find the Citizen
There's a citizen who is being threatened by suspicious men needs your help. (She will appear at the center of the N-PracticingYard,after the end 4th stage.)
Tell Ami what happened.
Tell Ami what happened. (Ami will be waiting for you somewhere in the N-PracticingYard)

Please help a citizen that's being threatened by suspicious men.
Find the Citizen
There's a citizen who is being threatened by suspicious men needs your help.
Tell Ami what happened.
Tell Ami what happened.

Tell Ami what happened.
Tell Ami what happened.

Compensation Level
You can receive EXP as compensation to level up. Good luck!
Talk to College Representative
Talk to the College Representative to complete this quest.
Chinese Test in Classroom 1-1
This portion of the test must be completed on time.
Get the Test Paper
Proceed to the Welfare Merchant at the Welfare Societies to get the test papers.
Begin the Exam at the Test Machine
Go to the 1-1 Terminal in Classroom 1-1.
Retrieve the Report Card
Take the Report Card from the Test Machine once you finish the test.
Deliver the Report Card
Please take the report card from the Test Machine and give it to the Test Server upon finishing the test.

Mission - Achieve Level 120
Students who reach a certain level will be rewarded accordingly. Please try your best to reach Level 120 so that the Student Director will recognize your efforts in regards to your training.
Achieve Mission Level 120
Please attain Level 120 status in order to achieve the next level mission.
Eliminating Violent Baldies
These nasty monsters are causing chaos in the streets. Please help eliminate 5 Violent Baldies to neutralize their evil.
Eliminating Bandits
These nasty Bandits are causing chaos in the streets. Please eliminate at least 1 Bandit to help stop their evil.
Report to the Police
Please proceed to the Policeman located at 95, 37 of the Wharf Passage once you eliminate the monsters.
Search for the Criminal
Since the Police Station lacks manpower, students are required to help investigate and eliminate all the suspected criminals involved in the different illegal activities in the Wharf area.
Retrieving the Ancient Books
Please help retrieve the Ancient Books from the suspected criminals carrying huge fish around the Wharf.
Retrieving the Old Books
Please retrieve the Old Books from the Gas Technicians who took important documents needed by the Police Department.
Retrieving the Encyclopedia
Please retrieve the missing Encyclopedia from the Storage Guard who took important documents needed by the Police Department.
Returning the Items
Please return all of the items to the Suspicious Person located at 105, 91 of the Wharf Passage.
Searching for the Evidence
Please help the Police Department gather all the necessary evidence and information that will support their ongoing investigation of illegal activities of the Green Gangsters.
Search for the First Piece of Evidence

Please try your best to investigate the situation by locating the Green Headquarters. Go to the 1st Floor of the Hangout Building and search for any information or any possible evidence that would support reports regarding their illegal activities. Search the map coordinates, 7, 17, at the Hangout 1F_Ch1 for evidence.
Search for the Second Piece of Evidence
Search the map coordinates, 13, 17, at the Hangout 1F_Ch1 for evidence.
Search for the Third Piece of Evidence
Search the map coordinates, 11, 14, at the Hangout 1F_Ch1 for evidence.
Collecting All the Evidence
Once you already collected the evidence that would help in the investigation, please report to the Policeman located at the map coordinates, 95, 37, of the Wharf Passage.
Searching for the First-Aid Kit

Due to numerous cases of illness, the Health Department is having trouble Medicine Supply shortages. It was reported that there are still Medicine Supplies around, and therefore students have been requested to help the Health Department collect them.
Proceed to Leonair Campus
Go to the map coordinates, 0, 19, of Leonair Campus Basement 1, and try to locate the Medical Personnel that has the Medicine Supplies.
Search for the Drugs Package
Please collect at least 10 Drugs Packages from the Head Nurse.
Delivering the Drugs Package
Please deliver the Drugs Package to the Nurse located at map coordinates, 6, 3, in Leonair Campus 1F.
Through Tunnel No. 3
The deplorable state of the tunnel is infested with monsters, just like the Trading Hole Tunnel. You must prove your superiority to them in order to travel through the tunnel.
Through the Tunnel
Monsters have blocked the important exits in the tunnel, and you must prove yourself to them to escape the tunnel. Please get through Tunnel No. 3 as soon as possible.
Reward for Prison Escapees
Please arrest Corrupted Pulis who suddenly shot his comrades.
Arrest Awakened Corrupted Pulis
Please arrest Awakened Corrupted Pulis who suddenly shot his comrades.
Search for Missing People
Someone reported a missing child after the incident. Please help the Police look for the child, and go to the Middle Hole to find any clues about the child's disappearance.
Search for Clues
You have just received a report of a missing child. Please look for clues in the vicinity of the Middle Hole Square.
Search for Other Clues
You have just received a report of a missing child. Please look for clues in the vicinity of the Middle Hole Square.
Search for More Clues
You have just received a report of a missing child. Please look for clues in the vicinity of the Middle Hole Square.
Report to the Trading Hole Police Station
The child that has disappeared is confirmed to be dead. Please report this news to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Reward for Prison Escapees
Please arrest Guitarist who extorted jewelleries and violenty disturbed the citizens.
Arrest Guitarist
"The order to arrest Guitarist who extorted jewelleries and violenty disturbed the citizens have come down. Jeproks are usually in Middle Hole."
Reward for Prison Escapees
The Police issued a warrant for the arrest of Hip Hop Girl because she stole some jewels. Please help arrest Hip Hop Girl.
Arrest Dispatched HipHop Girl
"The order to arrest Dispatched HipHop Girl who extorted jewelleries and violenty disturbed the citizens have come down. HipHop Girl are usually in Middle Hole."
Collecting Fake Certificates
The Police have discovered fake certificates being used by the assassins. Please get the certificates from the Assassins.
Collect the Fake Certificates
Please collect 10 Fake Certificates from the Verdugos and Sword Assassins.
Collecting Counterfeit Money
The Police discovered that the assassins are using counterfeit money. Please get the counterfeit money from the assassins.
Collect the Counterfeit Money
Please collect 10 Counterfeit Monies from the Verdugos and Sword Assassins.
Reward for Prison Escapees
The order to arrest Great Spice Girl who extorted jewelleries and violenty disturbed the citizens have come down.
Arrest Great Spice Girl
"The order to arrest Great Spice Girl who extorted jewelleries and violenty disturbed the citizens have come down. Spice Girl are usually in Root Hole."
Deliver the News
Return to your school and tell them about the situation at Middle Hole.
Look for the Student Director
Please report the status of Middle Hole to the Student Director.
Deliver the News
Return to your school and tell them about the situation at Middle Hole.
Look for the Student Director
Please report the status of Middle Hole to the Student Director.
Deliver the News
Return to your school and tell them about the situation at Middle Hole.
Look for the Student Director
Please report the status of Middle Hole to the Student Director.
Deliver Important Message
The Student Director wants to deliver a very important message to the Trading Hole Police Station. Please hurry and deliver the message to the Police Station.
Delivering the Message
Please deliver the important message to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Collecting Counterfeit Money
Some people who used counterfeit money has been found. Please get counterfeit money from Nightmare Clown, Pokka.
Collect the Counterfeit Money
Some people who used counterfeit money has been found in Root Hole. Please get the counterfeit money and destroy them.

Look for the Physics Teacher

Obtain Verification Result

The Physics Teacher requires students to take tests to help them improve their abilities.
Look for the Physics Teacher

Please arrest Poison Ninja Bian who extorted jewelleries and violenty disturbed the citizens.

Arrest Mad Haring Braso

Retrieving Bullet Pellets
Mobs demonstrating their power were seen at the Root Hole. It appears that some type of sphere is enhancing their strength, so please take these spheres away from them.
Obtaining the Spheres
Please collect the spheres from Pretty Veyahs.
Delivering the Spheres
Please deliver the spheres to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Obtain Weather Info
The earthquake caused the road to crack, but someone said that it the cracks might also be caused by the weather. Please collect a sample near the cracked road for research purposes.
Gathering Weather Info

The damage to the road occurred earlier than expected, and it is suspected that weather conditions might be the cause. Please take a sample from the vicinity of the cracked roads for research purposes.
Gathering Weather Info
Please continue to look for weather info that should be beneficial to everybody. Search for this info at the two long bridges nearby.
Gathering Weather Info
Please continue to look for weather info that should be beneficial to everybody. Search for this info at the two long bridges nearby.
Relay the Weather Info
Please give the weather info to the Trading Hole Police Station.
Rearrange Skill

Student Counselor created a party that includes all class together. However, if one of the members is injured, the party became very weak so he strengthens the extreme class and makes them possess 2 types of classes together. In order to accept the power of Extreme Class and become more powerful, user has to rearrange your skills.
Rearrange Skill
Meet Student Counselor in Market Place and Receive free Oblivion Potion that prepared by Amanuoruoyin for Extreme Members.
Amanuoruoyin's Help-Episode 1 - Receive the Murakano Blood Sample

During the battle in Forbidden Tower, suddenly Murakano remembered about Agape and because of that he lost his concentration. That moment is used by the students to land a final blow to him. However, it is so weird because Murakano looked happy in the last moment before he died. Murakano Blood not only can create the Bloody weapon but it can awake the ability of the consumer. Meet Amanuoruoyin in Prison and Receive the Murakano Blood Sample.
Receive the Murakano Blood Sample
Meet Amanuoruoyin in Prison and Receive the Murakano Blood Sample. Murakano Blood Sample have the effect to awake the consumer's hidden ability. (Prison 31,84)
Amanuoruoyin's Help-Episode 2 - Deliver the Expedition Participation Letter

Expedition has to be done in order to kill the remains remnants inside Forbidden Tower. However, the Hong Ji Yoon Shaman cannot attend because of the injured. To fill her place, Amanuoruoyin's sister Amanuoyin will go. Please deliver this Expedition Letter to inform it.
Deliver the Expedition Participation Letter
Deliver the Expedition Participation Letter to Amanuoyin in Head.B 90F.
Amanuoruoyin's Help-Episode 3 - Amanuoyin's Disappearance

The expedition to Forbidden Tower is taking too many victims. During the battle, when Amanuoyin is in the middle of curing Amanuoruoyin, enemies is suddenly attacked and Amanuoyin was disappeared after that. The Amanuoyin disappear was really made Amanuoruoyin sad and with so many injuries in his body, his condition is very danger. In order to help his recovery, please help to deliver the gift that prepared by Amanuoyin to him before she disappear.
Amanuoyin's Birthday Gift
Deliver the Amanuoyin's Birthday Gift to Amanuoruoyin.
Amanuoruoyin's Help-Episode 4 - Amanuoruoyin's Fury

The disappearance of Amanuoyin really made Amanuoruoyin sad. To take revenge, he was preparing some projects to strengthen the Extreme class students. However, the result of taking the power from the Bail Stone is out of control and make Amanuoruoyin cannot control his Fury. In order to make Amanuoruoyin calm again, please find the Refine Pill for him.
Amanuoruoyin's Fury
Find 10 Refine Pills from mobs in St. Research Cplx.
Deliver the Refine Pill
Meet Amanuoruoyin and Deliver the Refine Pill.
Amanuoruoyin's Help-Episode 5 - Qualify Evaluation

Since Amanuoruoyin cannot control his fury, he cannot go together with the expedition to revenge so we need someone to take his place. Please take his place in this expedition. However, before you join, there is a test for you.
Qualify Evaluation
Kill the mobs in Lost City.
Amanuoruoyin's Help-Episode 6 - Last Request
Since you have already qualified from the test, Amanuoruoyin is requesting a help to take revenge. Go kill the mobs.
Last Request
Kill the mobs in Chaos Island.
First Mission
Extreme class is the most suitable class for this mission in this state. However, careless will not be tolerated. Wish you can work hard to finish this First Mission.
Find the Suspicious Folk
Meet Suspicious Folk in Wharf Passage and Fulfill his request. (Wharf Passage 105,91)
Suspicious Folk Request
Kill 30 Fisherman mobs in Wharf Passage.
The Legendary Begins -Episode 1- The Answer to Confession
In a magical show, you proposed to a girl, who by chance is holding a Dahlia flower. Find out what that flower symbolizes by talking to Crucio in the Market Place.
The Meaning of the Answer
Find out the meaning of Dahlia flower through Crucio.
The Legendary Begins-Episode 2- The Selfish Association
Because of your weak magical powers, you ended up losing her love. Find the Magician Instructor and suggest ways on how you can improve and strengthen magical powers of yours and Magician Class.
The Ways for Stronger Magic
Suggest ways on how to improve Magician Class to the Magician Instructor. Magician Instructor(SG) : [X:15, Y:13] Magician Instructor(MP) : [X:15, Y:14] Magician Instructor(PH) : [X:16, Y:13]
The Legendary Begins-Episode 3- The Solitary Battle

You have been expelled from the Association of Magic because of the revolution you have initiated. Thinking of your loved one who died, you have to keep going. Let the solitary battle begin by training and learning the combat of magic. Take the bus to Mystic Peak Lake Water Store and move to Big Waterfall [X:36, Y:79].
Magic Combat Training 1
Pleasse eliminate the Chickens.
Magic Combat Training 2
Please eliminate the Stray Dogs.
The Legendary Begins-Episode 4- A Mysterious Old Man

In the middle of your magic combat training, you encountered Crucio. You dared to challenge the old man but ended up defeated. Crucio has a favor to ask, and if you fulfill it, you will learn about his powerful magic combat skills. Receive Crucio's favor.
Crucio's Investigation of his Lover's Whereabouts
Find out the news about Crucio's lover from the past. Talk to the Police [X:71, Y:148] around the entrance to SG HolePassage to find out.
The Result of the Investigation
Infrom Crucio about the result of the investigation.
The Legendary Begins-Episode 5- Awakening the Senses Part 1

Crucio has explained how magic battles can be won easily and how to figure out his loved one's whereabouts. Never be fooled in battles of magic. Learn how not to rely only on your vision but with your senses as well. Receive Crucio's first lesson.
Dark Training 1 [Sacred Hole Passage]
Please eliminate the Corrupted Hounds.
The Legendary Begins-Episode 6- Awakening the Senses Part 2
Learn Crucio's Second Lesson.
Dark Training 2 [Tunnel No. 3]
Please eliminate the Cold Wolves
The Legendary Begins-Episode 7- Awakening the Senses Part 3
Learn Crucio's Final Lesson
Dark Training 3 [Tunnel No. 4]
Please eliminate the Gorusi.
Dark Training 4 [Eliminating the Strongest]
Please eliminate Reckless Gorusi.
The Legendary Begins-Episode 8- The Dangerous Attempt

During the espionage activities of the Assassin, this was found out that the Daramais figured out the Dr. Choi¡¯s plot that he was trying to seize the Large Hadron Collider which has been created and lost and they asked Magicus to hide the Large Hadron Collider for the solution.
Finding Magical Ingredient 1
Collect 10 Prisms from Totoy Bato and Trusty Bato to hide Large Hadron Collider by distorting light waves.
Finding Magical Ingredient 2
Collect 10 Stealth Minerals from Big Boy Maso and Trusty Maso to prevent Large Hadron Collider from metal detector.
The Legendary Begins-Episode 9- Enemy Arising

You will hear the information about the Daramais from the Assassin Instructor. In the other side of the world, they had a bitter experience such as that they were pushed out from the domain of light to the domain of dark by Lagians. In addition, you will receive intelligence that Daramais' senses are developed because they only live in the dark. Please retrieve this information from the Assassin Student in the MarketPlace.
Daramai's Document Information Receipt
Retrive the information about the Daramais from the Assassin Student in the MarketPlace.
The Legendary Begins-Episode 10- Soft and fair goes far.

The Large Hadron Collider is hidden by magic, but it is useless for the Daramais who have extrasensory. The benefit of using magic to combat is no need to meet force with force and also, soft and fair goes far. It is learnt from the Daramins who use their extrasensory in the dark, so please use your extrasensory perception to show the mighty usage of magic to combat.
Fighting Daramai Warriors
Please eliminate the priests at St. Research Complex.

The Image Expert's daughter has a spore allergy and is feeling ill. He won't be able to restore the tape until she feels better. Please help him find the cause of the illness. Click the "Details" button for more information.
Gathering Information from the Police Station
Get more information by asking around at the Police Station.
The Sacred Financial Group's Special Agent
Please meet the Special Agent and get more information since the illness might be related to the Leonair Campus incident.

The Guard's Request

A Sacred Gate Defender guard says there is a group of people in front of the Control Room Building that are impersonating him and trying to harass other people. Proceed to the Sacred Gate Hole to confiscate the SG Defender's Batons. Click the "Details" button for more information.

Giving the Batons

Ran World on Style

Continuous war has intoxicated the environment and there were too many contaminants left abandoned and we decided to spray antidotes over it for people. In order to help the injured Assassins, work together with Ryuin and buy some time. Buy some time by defeating mobs at Lost City and Chaos Island.
Defeat 50 Most Elite Supporters
Please defeat Most Elite Supporter mobs at Lost City
Defeat 100 Advance Scouters
Please defeat Advance Scouter mobs at Chaos Island

New challenge

Student Registration

The automated registration process is currently unavailable. Proceed to the Brawler Instructor to get an application form. Your Instructor will then give you further instructions. You will be rewarded with Skill Points upon completing the registration process. Click the [Details] button for more information.
Acquiring a Registration Form

Go find Scientist Instructor and get the application for registration. The form must be acquired from the instructor himself since student registration isn't automated. If you have hard time locating her then, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 22 Y: 3.
Locate Nurse Trainee

The Nurse Trainee provides free medical treatment. Students will need to visit her often in the future, which is why they are required to learn where it is during the registration period. If you have hard time locating her then, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 3 Y: 22
Submit Registration Form
Please submit the registration form to the Student Director after filling it out. If you have hard time locating her then, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 8 Y: 0.
Receive Bread
Eating a bread can heal you a little. Merchant is giving out some bread so please go receive yours. If you have hard time locating him then, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 10 Y: 2
Final Confirmation

Return to Scientist Instructor and submit the registration form and get it confirmed to receive the Exit Application Form. It is required to ensure the campus safety. If you have hard time locating her then, please refer to map coordinates, X: 23 Y: 3
Exit Approval

Submit the Exit Application Form to Student Director and get it confirmed to receive basic equipments and stat points. If you have hard time locating him then, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 8 Y: 0

The Force Field Authentication

We have Force Field Systems that protect us, but the system outside campus recently went haywire, causing people and other creatures outside to mutate. It's lucky that the Force Field protecting the campus is still stable. Now, I need you to check the Force Field Systems in other areas, and make sure that they're working properly. Authenticating these other Force Field Systems will increase their effectiveness.
Test the Terminal in Study Classroom Center 2
Confirm the location of Study Classroom Center 2, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 2 Spiritual Spheres from the Little Hooligans around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in Study Classroom Center 2.
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.

Old Man's Present
He says that you will be able to find a fine armor among the cargo he had ordered. Go to Wharf No.4 and find it on the Cargo Ship. Press [Details] for more information.
Find the Cargo
Please go to Wharf No. 4 and fin the Cargo Ship to search for the item. Search thoroughly around the deck, and you should be able to find it.
Request of Picture Expert

Picture Expert says that his daughter is ill because of the spore allergy so if you don't help his daughter, he is not going to restore the tape. Find out what is causing it and help her. Press [Details] for more information.
Gather information from the police station
Police Officer at the Trading Hole said he had conveyed some sort of information but the Picture Expert claims that he has no memory of such. Please go back to the police station for more details.
Meet the agent dispatched by Saint Foundation.
Seems like this is related to Leonine School somehow so please go meet the agent dispatched by the Foundation in front of the Leonine School to gather more information.
Performance Order

The dispatched agent from Saint Foundation hopes that students would train harder after he saw the surveillance tape of Leonine School, as if he think the situations got far worse than he had expected. Go ask Scientist Student Representative for extra training. Press [Details] for more information.
Find Scientist Student Representative
There is a Scientist Student Representative who is known for hard drill. In order to improve your ability, please go find her for an extra training.
Retrieving Weapon
The suspicious group of people with fake IDs have took all the products of Weapon Specialist. They were dressed as guards so please go retrieve the weapons.
Retrieve Weapons
Retrieve the weapons from the mysterious people with fake IDs.
Deliver Weapons
Give the retrieved weapons back to Weapon Specialist at the Middle Hole.
Retrieving a Book 1

Do the Extra Activity

To Saint Power Plant

Defeat Veno who had been brain washed by the bionic experiment. Some students has seen him near the Solar Power Plant once in a while. Also they said that once he appears he hardly leaves the spot.
Defeat Veno
It won't be possible to defeat him alone. Please party up with other strong students.
Dangerous Company
Hidden power plant was found near the Saint HQ. Go see the Student Director (Dispatched) who is located there and ask about the power plant.
Talk to Student Director (Dispatched)
Report to Student Director (Dispatched) at Saint Power Plant.
Search Power Facility 1-2
To find out what happened in the power plant please check the Power Facility 1-2 first and report back to Student Director (Dispatched).
Check Power Facility 1-2
Approach 'Power Facility 1-2' located on the right side of Hydropower Plant.
Purify Fluorescent Guard Dog
It is almost impossible to get near the Power Facility 1-2, there are just too many Guard Dogs. They must be defeated. Make sure to report to Student Director (Dispatched) after defeating them.
Defeat Guard Dog
Defeat Guard Dog at Saint Power Plant.
Report to Student Director (Dispatched)
Report to Student Director dispatched to Saint Power Plant.
Extract Virus Sample
Plague has just been spread but I expect severe damages. Defeat the Guard Dogs all over this place to help Nurse Trainee (Dispatched) and extract the virus blood samples and bring it to her.
Extract Virus Blood Sample
Defeat Guard Dog at Saint Power Plant and extract Virus Blood Sample.
Deliver to Nurse Trainee (Dispatched)
Deliver it to Nurse Trainee (Dispatched) at Saint Power Plant.
[Repeat] Extract Normal Blood Sample
Normal blood samples are also needed to make antibiotics. Please get more normal blood samples and bring it to Nurse Trainee (Dispatched).
Extract Normal Blood Sample
Defeat Guard Dog at Saint Power Plant and extract Normal Blood Sample.
Deliver to Nurse Trainee (Dispatched)

Report to Student Counselor about the Power Plant status information gathered.
Report to Student Counselor
Report to Student Counselor at Market Plaza

This place was bustling with people before the plague but it has turned to a gloomy area and we are trying to find survivors. From what we know, Ex-manager of this place is still alive somewhere.

Located near Control Tower Entrance A.
Report Survivor Recon Result
The Power Plant ex-manager was found but he was unable to find any leads. But he is sure about one thing that this place isn't safe at all.

Deliver to Power Plant Manager

Jealousy and Mischief

Extra Activity Teacher was surrounded by secrets when I met him when I was getting nurse training. He looked very strong but there was a fatal weakness. It made all the other people very uncomfortable.

Please talk to Dispatched Extra Activity Teacher at Control Tower in Saint Power Plant
Key Member of Partisan

Find Obinine
Someone has seen an unidentified person at the Meteorite Bridge.
Report to Student Director (Dispatched)
Report to Student Director (Dispatched)

Aspirin Production II
World Tree is a legendary tree which survived among evil spirits and unpleasant mutants. There is a rumor that the scent of its herb can call spirits. This herb must work well to cure schizophrenia.

Deliver Herb to Nurse Trainee (Dispatched)

Piece of Partisan Pendant

Please find captain Veno who must be around here somewhere and report back to me. If you cannot find him then please find me any trace of him. I cannot even remember how long I have been here.. Captain and I performed a very special experiment with an old man.. But I just recently found out that the experiment was wrong.. Please find the captain first..

Please talk to Obinine

Lucian used to be one of the greatest warriors of our Partisan. Many enemies had fell before Lucian's sword. However, He must have felt that he was getting weaker as the time passed by. Therefore, he planned something terrible. He wanted to have the power of absolute point. He needs to find his senses back. Go teach him that he is wrong and retrieve our pendant from him.

Report the final result to the Student Director (Dispatched)
Reach Level 240
Level up is the only thing we can do now. Reach your level until Lv. 240 then meet Student Conselor in the Lost City to receive the confirmation
The report of Reaching level 240
Meet Student Director (Dispatched) in Lost City and get a confirmation that you've reached level 240.
Never Ending Battle
The defensive lines in Lost City are falling one by one. We need your strength. Please support us in this time of need.
Support 1st line of defense
Defeat Elite Scouter
Support 2nd line of defense
Defeat Elite Supporter, Armed Supporter, and take their weapons.
Secure regroup place written instruction
Defeat Most Elite Scouter, Elite Armed Supporter, and secure the regroup place written instruction.
Re-deliver regroup place written instruction
Please deliver the encrypted message to Technical Teacher (Dispatched).
Support last line of defense
Defeat Most Elite Supporter.
Mislead the enemy on the regroup place
To mislead the enemy on our regroup place, please defeat The Chaser.
Raid the supply depot
Defeat the Crasher and raid the supply depot.
Report Result
Report result to Student Director (Dispatched).
Chaos Begins
The enemy is reorganizing their camps and preparing for next attack. Need to gain time for the students in rear. Distract them as attacking their camps.
Swoop on the Assault Trooper
Eliminate the Assault Trooper.
Sudden attack the Advanced Trooper
Eliminate the Advanced Trooper.
Seize the Mutant citizen
Eliminate the Mutant citizen.
Bring the Twisted Soldier to a certain place
Lure the Twisted Soldier to move to X : 82, Y : 102 .
Provoke the Twisted Soldier
Eliminate the Twisted Soldier.
Block the attack directives
Eliminate the The Transformer and get the attack directives.
Report it to Ryuin
Report it to Ryuin
Recruiting Supporters
We are recruiting students to support us in exploring the newly discovered area. Please talk with NPC "Student Counselor" in the MarketPlace.
Fill in form
Please talk with the NPC "Student Counselor" in MarketPlace to fill in the form.
Move to tunnel construction site
Please move to the tunnel which will lead you to the new area. It is still under construction and located in Root Hole.
Construction Chief's Request
While we were rushing the construction of the tunnel, the drilling machine ran into some issues. We need the spare parts in the storage room to fix it.
Ask about the storage room key
To obtain the spare parts needed to repair the drilling machine, the key to the storage room is needed. Please ask the "Student Counselor" NPC in the MarketPlace about this key.
Look for the storage room key
The Costruction Supervisor has the key. Go and look for "Construction Supervisor", "Construction Supervisor Leader", or "Dispatched Construction Supervisor" in the Middle Hole to find the key.
Deliver the storage room key
Once you have found the key, please deliver it to the "Construction Chief".
Investigate Surrounding
It's imperative that whoever comes first to DaeShin District should investigate the surroundings. Look for any potential threats and report back.
Investigate Surrounding I
Search the area around the Farmers Market Right Road.
Investigate Surrounding II
Search the area around the Farmers Market Area no.2.
Report Investigation Result
Submit your report to "Assassin Agent".
Merchants Oppression
The scouts were attacked by the merchants when they scouted the surroundings. This issue has become more serious and therefore, it is important that we apprehend these merchants.
Defeat the fish merchants
Defeat and bring over the "Fish Merchant"
Defeat the meat merchants
Defeat and bring over the "Meat Merchant"
Merchants Oppression (Repeat)
The merchants who were released not long ago have attacked again. Please take control and bring them over again.
Defeat the fish merchants
Defeat and bring over the "Fish Merchant"
Defeat the meat merchants
Defeat and bring over the "Meat Merchant"
Investigating the Reason for Violence
The merchants who were released keep on repeating their mistakes when they are outside. You must ask "Scientist Instructor" for directions.
Meet and talk with the Scientist Instructor in your home city.
Please consult the "Scientist Instructor" to find out the reason behind this strange behavior
Investigating Violence I
According to the "Scientist Instructor", you might find some answers by investigating the "Loan Shark" who hang around the merchants.
Investigate Loan Shark
Please capture the main suspect behind the merchants' violent behavior, the "Loan Shark".
Investigate Drugs
Please bring the drugs that the "Loan Shark" possess to "Scientist Instructor".
Troublesome Artists
Some crazy artists have plundered or attacked the supply drop carriages. Please get rid of them.
Get rid of Lanky Clown
Please get rid of the "Lanky Clown" who is causing disturbances
Get rid of Unknown Painter
Please get rid of the "Unknown Painter" who is causing disturbances
Troublesome Artists (Repeat)
Some crazy artists have plundered or attacked the supply drop carriages again. Please get rid of them.
Get rid of Lanky Clown
Please get rid of the "Lanky Clown" who is causing disturbances
Get rid of Unknown Painter
Please get rid of the "Unknown Painter" who is causing disturbances
Investigating Violence II
The analysis on the drugs is complete. Please get the result of analysis from "Scientist Instructor" and give it to "Assassin Agent"
Receive drug analysis
Get the drug analysis report from the "Scientist Instructor"
Deliver the test result
Deliver the analysis report to "Assassin Agent"
Wiping Out the Loan Shark
We have found out the reason why the merchants are so violent. It is because of the drugs that the Loan Shark uses on them. Please wipe out the Loan Shark.
Wipe out Loan Shark Employee
Please defeat Loan Shark Employee
Wipe out Loan Shark Marketer
Please defeat Loan Shark Marketer
Wipe out Loan Shark Collector
Please defeat Loan Shark Collector
Wiping Out the Loan Shark (Repeat)
This group of vicious people have gathered at this place. Please wipe out the Loan Shark.
Wipe out Loan Shark Employee
Please defeat Loan Shark Employee
Wipe out Loan Shark Marketer
Please defeat Loan Shark Marketer
Wipe out Loan Shark Collector
Please defeat Loan Shark Collector
Restart Scouting Operation
After the wiping out of the Loan Sharks, it is now possible to venture deeper into other areas. Please do so.
Venture deeper
Please venture deeper and scout around the area where the "Writing Trees" are.
Defending Surprise Attack I
Aggressive beasts launched a surprise attack. Please get rid of them.
Defending Surprise Attack II
Aggressive beasts launched a surprise attack. Please get rid of them.
Trainer's Request
The "Magician Animal Trainer"'s passion about animals is incredible. He even would like to try and tame those wild and ignorant beasts.
Capturing mutant animal I
Defeat and capture "Mutant Leopard".
Capturing mutant animal II
Defeat and capture "Mutant Rhino"
Trainer's Request (Repeat)
Although passion can give you strength. But, it has been deemed impossible to tame these mutant beasts. Please defeat them for safety purposes.
Defeat mutant animals I
Please get rid of "Mutant Leopard"
Defeat mutant animals II
Please get rid of "Mutant Rhino"
Lingering Attachment
We have received a report that someone around the zoo can freely handle these mutant animals. Could you please find this person and find out how he is able to control these animals.
Capture the Safari Hunter
Capture the "Safari Hunter" and learn the secret of controlling the beasts from him.
Report the Result
Report the result to "Magician Animal Trainer".
Defeat the Loan Shark Group Leader
We found out that the remaining of the Loan Shark organization is hiding somewhere in this area. Please find and get rid of them to completely annihilate the group.
Defeat Loan Shark Group Leader
Defeat "Loan Shark Group Leader Accountant".
Report the Result
Report the result to "Assassin Agent".

[Daily Limited] Evil Spirit Altar
There are reports that ominous energy is engulfing the underground level of the school. Please go there and investigate it yourself.
Receive Evil Spirit Altar Entry Ticket.
Receive ticket to enter the Evil Spirit Altar
[Daily Limited] Cryptic Lab
There are reports of strange movements which can be seen in the Cryptic Laboratory. Please go there and investigate it yourself.
Receive Cryptic Laboratory Entry Ticket
Receive ticket to enter the Cryptic Laboratory
[Repetition] Blazed Curiousity
Grocers curiousity is blazing like hell. Destroy the enemies inside the city and collect Inferno Crystals from the living being.
Collect Inferno Crystal
Defeat the monsters and collect 100 Inferno Crystals.
Student Registration

The automated registration process is currently unavailable. Proceed to Assassin Insturctor Ryuin to get an application form. Your Instructor will then give you further instructions. You will be rewarded with Skill Points upon completing the registration process. Click the [Details] button for more information.
Acquiring a Registration Form

Proceed to Assassin Insturctor Ryuin and get the application for registration. The form must be acquired from the instructor himself since student registration isn't automated. If you fail to find him, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 14 Y: 11(Main Centre).
Confirm the Health Room's Location

The Health Room provides free medical treatment. Students will need to visit this place often in the future, which is why they are required to learn where it is during the registration period. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 4 Y: 22(Main Centre).
Delivering the Registration Form

Please submit the registration form to the Student Director at the Admin Office after filling it up. The Admin Office is located at the entrance of Main Center 1st floor, next to the Grocery Merchant. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 8 Y: 0(Main Centre).
Collecting the Bread

You can recover HP by eating Bread. Registered students, please collect some Bread from the vendor at the Welfare Society. The Grocery Merchant is located next to the entrance on the 1st floor of Main Campus. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 10 Y: 3(Main Centre).
Final Confirmation

Hand over the Completed Registration Form to Assassin Insturctor Ryuin. After getting final registration approval, you will acquire the Exit Application Form. All students must complete the Exit Application to ensure the campus's safety. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 14 Y: 11(Main Centre).
Exit Approval

Submit the Exit Application Form to the Student Director at the Admin Office. Collect all the needed basic equipment, and wisely allocate the rewarded Skill Points. If you fail to find it, please refer to the map coordinates, X: 8 Y: 0(Main Centre).

The Force Field Authentication

We have Force Field Systems that protect us, but the system outside campus recently went haywire, causing people and other creatures outside to mutate. It's lucky that the Force Field protecting the campus is still stable. Now, I need you to check the Force Field Systems in other areas, and make sure that they're working properly. Authenticating these other Force Field Systems will increase their effectiveness.
Test the Terminal in Study Classroom Center 2
Confirm the location of Study Classroom Center 2, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 2 Spiritual Spheres from the Little Hooligans around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in Study Classroom Center 2.
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Test the Terminal in Right Dragon Park
Confirm the location of Right Dragon Park, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 4 Spiritual Spheres from the Little Bandits around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in Right Dragon Park
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Test the Terminal in the History Center
Confirm the location of the History Center, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 8 Spiritual Spheres from the Bandits around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in the History Center
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Test the Terminal in the Library
Confirm the location of the Library, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 9 Spiritual Spheres from the Gangsters around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in the Library
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Test the Terminal in the Society Room
Confirm the location of the Society Room, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 12 Spiritual Spheres from the Sluggers around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in the Society Room
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Test the Terminal in the Walking Zone
Confirm the location of the Walking Zone, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 16 Spiritual Spheres from the Slashers around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in the Walking Zone
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Test the Terminal in the Science Center
Confirm the location of the Science Center, and check if the Terminal is functioning properly. Activate the machine to test it.
Collecting Spiritual Spheres
You must collect 20 Spiritual Spheres from the Brawlers around the area to fully authenticate the Force Field System.
Optimize the Force Field System in the Science Center
Use the Spiritual Spheres to complete the Force Field System Authentication. You must follow the procedures in order to optimize the Force Field's power.
Final Force Field Authentication
Please finalize the Force Field Authentications by giving them to the Student Director at the Admin Office.

Secret of the Freshman

So Sung Il, whom you met while reassembling the Eight Signs of Divine, has some bad news about the secret of the Freshman. Speak with the teachers to discern whether the Freshman incident really happened. This might be a more urgent problem for now.
Find Information on the List of Saints
Find the List of Saints that So Sung Il saw in the Underground Laboratory, and search for any information that you can about the List of Saints.
Meet the Student Director
Speak with the Student Director about the information you obtained.
Meet the Instructor
Confirm the information you obtained with Assassin Insturctor Ryuin.
Meet the Agent

Blood Sample

The Nurse located at SG Rotary is curious why the Werewolf has gotten more vicious after going over to Another World. With a blood sample of werewolf, she believes she can find the cause so please get her the blood sample. Press details for more information
Get blood sample of werewolf
Get a Blood Sample from a Werewolf
Deliver the blood sample of Werewolf
Please deliver the Blood Sample of Werewolf to the Nurse at the SG Hole Rotary
Support Request

Physics Teacher has received support request from the Dispatched Agent in front of Leonine School. Please defeat the Saint Private Guards who are threatening Dispatched Agent so he can continue investigating the phenomenon and then please tell him that you have defeated them. Press details for more information
Defeat Dispatched Agent
Please defeat 10 Saint Private Guards.
Report back to Dispatched Agent
Go report to the Dispatched Agent in front of Leonine School
Need help but..

The dispatched agent in front of SG School wants to get help investigating Phenomenon in Leonine School. However, he doesn't believe that you have what it takes to help him in Leonine School. Go see Assassin Manager Sia at 00 for training. Press details for more information.
Please go find Assassin Manager Sia at TradingHole
Sia will give you a training harder than what you received in school. Please go find her for the training and get ready to investigate the Leonine School which has turned into a dead land.
First Training

Assassin Manager Sia says that she will begin the training sessions to make you a stronger Assassin. Defeat Skating Boys for the training and to make Trading Hole a little more safer. Press details for more information.
Defeat Skating Boys
Please defeat 15 Skating Boys who are making the street insecure.
Report Back
Report back to Assassin Manger Sia
Second Training

Assassin Manager Sia says that you will need more training before you can go investigate at Leonine school. Train against and defeat Street Princess (Got Milk) who are threat to public security. Press details for more information.
Defeat Street Princess (Got Milk)
Please defeat 5 Street Princess (Got Milk) who are threat to public security.
Report Back
Report back to Assassin Manger Sia
Ready for Investigation

Assassin Manager Sia says that you are ready for the Leonine School. However, Dispatched Agent won't trust you so bring him some Bine Hands from Poison Ivies and prove yourself that you are ready to investigate Leonine School. Press Details for more information.
Get Bine Hands from Poison Ivies
Get 3 Bine Hands from Poison Ivies and prove yourself to Dispatched agent that you are ready to investigate Leonine School.
Deliver Bine Hands to Dispatched Agent
Bring Bine Hands from Poison Ivies and prove yourself to Dispatched agent that you are ready to investigate Leonine School.
The Day of Phenomenon 1

Dispatched Agent would like to find out more about what happened on the day of Phenomenon at Leonine School. Fortunately, there are beings that are still sane so please go talk to them. Press details for more information.
Meet the Spirit
Listen to the Spirit what happened on the day of Phenomenon at the entrance of Leonine School Main Building
Meet the Leonine School Nurse Trainee
Listen to the Nurse Trainee what happened on the day of Phenomenon at the Leonine School Main Building teacher's room.
Meet the Leonine School Student Director
Listen to the Student Director what happened on the day of Phenomenon at the Leonine School Main Building teacher's room.
Finding Notebook

Leonine School Director has lost his precious notebook to Spiritual Boys and Wicked Girls who are roaming the 1st floor. Please retrieve torn pages and cover of the notebook from them. Press details for more information.
Find torn pages of Notebook
Retrieve 3 torn pages from Spiritual Boys
Find the cover of Notebook
Please retrieve notebook cover from Wicked Girls
Deliver torn pages and cover of Notebook
Deliver the retrieved torn pages and cover of notebook back to Student Director of Leonine School.
The Day of Phenomenon 2

Student Director of Leonine School has given the Leonine Notebook saying that it may help investigating the Phenomenon. It once went through a restoration process but still not easy to read it. However, please take it to Dispatched Agent, it might help him investigate the Phenomenon. Press details for more information.
Deliver Leonine Notebook
Please deliver the damaged Leonine Notebook which is still hard to read after the restoration to Dispatched Agent
The Third Training

Assassin Manager Sia says that she will begin the training session to make you a stronger Assassin. Currently, Hodels are threatening the security of Trading Hole so please go defeat them they would be a good training opponent. Press details for more information.
Defeat Hodel!
Please defeat the 6 Hodels who are threats to Trading Hole.
The Fourth Training

Assassin Manager Sia says that you need more training to become a stronger assassin. The opponent, this time is 'Fiery Aunty'. She terrifies people but if you have been training as instructed then she would be an easy match for you. Defeat her and prove the result of your training. Press details for more information.
Defeat Fiery Aunty
Defeat 4 Fiery Aunty who are threatening the people to prove the result of your training.
Retrieving the Stolen Data

Assassin Manager Sia's Data Books which she had recorded all the data before the phenomenon were stolen by Freezing Clowns. Her books are very important finding the cause of Phenomenon so please get them back to her. Press details for more information
Find Sia's Data Book
Please retrieve 1 Sia's Data Books which has been stolen by Freezing Clown.
Give back Sia's Data Book
Please give the found Data Books back to Sia.
Take down the riot..

Jail Warden needs more equipments to take down the riot of prisoners that out break during the sudden phenomenon. They were unable take the Bullet-Proof Vest and Automatic rifle when they escaped the riot. Press details for more information.
Find Bullet-proof Vest
Defeat Black Ninja, Dispatched Black Ninja and retrieve the bulletproof vest.
Find Automatic Rifle
Retrieve the automatic rifle from Corrupted Parak and Corrupted Pulis in Prison.
Give back the found equipments
Give back the Vest and Rifle back to Jail Warden
Status Check

Assassin Manager Sia is curious about the status of Trading Hole. Please go see 'Weapon Shop Owner', 'Nurse' and 'Ms. Choi (Chloe)' and ask about Trading Hole status. Press details for more information.
Meet the Weapon Shop Owner
Meet the Weapon Shop Owner and ask about the status of Trading Hole.
Meet the Nurse.
Meet the Nurse and ask her about the status of Trading Hole.
Meet Ms. Choi (Chloe)
Meet Ms. Choi (Chloe) and ask her about the status of Trading Hole.
Retrieving First Aid

"The nurses in Middle Hole are in need of medicines to treat the wounded. The emergency medicine that Awakened Black Ninja, Corrupted Parak, Corrupted Pulis usually have can be used to treat the wounded. The Awakened Black Ninja, Corrupted Parak, Corrupted Pulis have become strange after they got angry. Please get the emergency medicine that they have. Press the ""Detail"" button to seen additional contents that might be helpful."
Find the First Aid.
Retrieve the emergency medicine that Awakened Black Ninja, Corrupted Parak, Corrupted Pulis have.
Hand over the First Aid.
Give the retrieved First Aid back to Nurse.
Supplies

Assassin Manager Sia has put some helpful equipments which will help you in the future at the Wharf Passage (Pier). She has hidden it in a cargo ship at Pier No.4. Please go find them. Press details for more information.
Find the equipments
Please find the equipments which Sia has hidden in the Cargo ship at Pier No.4 You will be able to find it easily, just look around the deck. (X:74,Y:17)
Wharf Subjugation

The Police in front of Wharf Management Office needs help bringing back the peace to the Wharf Passage (Pier). The Storage Guards, Gas Technician, Vicious Sailors and Bandits who has been turned into freaks by the sudden phenomenon must be defeated to bring back the peace. Please defeat all of them. Press details for more information.

Defeat Gas Technician
Please defeat 3 Gas Technician around Pier
Defeat Vicious Sailor

Defeat Bandits

Report back to Police.
Report back to Police about the result.
Request of Picture Expert

Picture Expert says that his daughter is ill because of the spore allergy so if you don't help his daughter, he is not going to restore the tape. Find out what is causing it and help her. Press [Details] for more information.
Gather information from the police station
Police Officer at the Trading Hole said he had conveyed some sort of information but the Picture Expert claims that he has no memory of such. Please go back to the police station for more details.
Meet the agent dispatched by Saint Foundation.
Seems like this is related to Leonine School somehow so please go meet the agent dispatched by the Foundation in front of the Leonine School to gather more information.
